dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ ga pas ma ragi pa'i sgo nga' bas dral ba/ rigapa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par roge pa thob pa/ srid pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ chags/
pa dang/ bkur stis pa de phyogs pa// dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang/ brjed par bya ba dang/ mngon du skyabar bya bar gyur to// de nas tshodwang
ldan pa ka tyā ya na chen po lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas kyi deg slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa katya ya na chen po la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ tshudang ldan pa ka tyā ya na chen pa la 'di skad
ces smras so// mkhan po ni bdag cag gis mthong ste/ bsnyen bkur mang bgyis lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag rnams bsnyen bkur bgyud du mchi'o// bu dag/
de bzhin du gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bsnyen bkur bya ba kho na yin no// de'i tshe gro bzhin skyes rna ba bya ba ra 'khor de
[z ]// nyid kyi nang du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ra stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus [）]
mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka tyā yan chen pa la 'di skad ces smras sa// bdag gas mkhan po yang mthong/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku na mthong
na/ gzugs kyi sku ma mthong bas/ mkhan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku ltar mchi'o// bu de bzhin du gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba na red par dka ṭṭaste/ dper na ma ga a khum wa rwa dang mtshungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byos la/ bdag gse
tshig 'dis reg par spyod dam zhes bya pa'i bar dang/ zhu ba lnga po 'di dag kyang zhus shige/ btsun pa rje can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na dge slong nyung bas grangs bcu bskyangs dka'
na de la ji ltar padagagabasgrub par bgyi/ btsun pa b.lang ga rjes kyis sa rtsubalor gyur pa dang/ rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na 'di lta bu'i gding ba dang dgabapa 'du lta ste/
lug gapags pa dang/ bo'i ko ba dang/ ri rogs kyi legasapa dang/ ra'i pags pa las brgyad do// ji ltar yul gzhan dag na bar lta bu'i gdange ba dang dag ba pa 'di lta ste/
bal stan dang/ shing shun gyi stan dang/ srane bal gyi stan dang/ ras bal gyi snyan dag mchis pa de bzhin du/ rdo can zhes bgyi ba' yul gyi mthub na dad lta bu'i gdang ba dang dgab pa 'di
lta ste ka lug ga pags pa dang zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin no// chus 'dag par patshal ba'i mi rnams lhag par khrus la spyod pa dang/ dge slong gas dge slong la chos gos bskur ba tshu rol nas ni
spags la/ dharanu ma mchis na/ re gang la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes zhus shog/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhan skyes rna ba bye ba ras cang ma smra bas mo rang ldan pakalta ma na chen pa las

mnyan no// de nas tshod nga ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ras/ tshe dang ldan pa katya ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka tyā ya na chen po'i rdung nas song
ngo ༔ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye bar ri nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro'i dus su sham blabs pagos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thog nas/ gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
grong du bsad snyoms la zhugs te/ ji tsam nas ma gyis mnyan yod du phyin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba re lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa
gnyis bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ tsho dang pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo song la de bzhin gshegs pa dang glo bzhin skyes rna ba byeb ri gtsug lag khang gcig
tu khrashoms shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshul la zhas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi ltar mnyanānas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang globazhin skyes rna ba bya
ba rigatsug lag khang gcig tu khri bshams nas/ bcom ldan das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang
gro bzhin skyes rna ba bya ba ra gtsug lag khang gcig tu khri bshams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das pa de'i dus la bab lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba rigatsug
lag khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ gtsug lag khangag phyi rol tu zhabs gzhas bkrus te gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas// dgos pa mngon du bzhugs bzhugs so// tshe dang

tsa ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bya ba ra pa nga gtsug lag khang ga phyi rol tu rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas } gtsug lag khang du zhugs twa skyil mo krung bcas lus bsrang nas/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par
bzhag nas 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bya be ri 'phags pa'i mi smras bas dang mtshan ma 'dus par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam
ka/ dungs su nye ba na/ tshod ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ra la bka' stsal pa// gro bzhin skyes chos gang la bdag gsa mngon par shes te/ mngon par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa la
khyed bas par gyas shage/ re nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ra bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang/ rdo can zhes bya ba'i mtha' dbyas kyang ros ched du brjod pa dang/ pha rol 'gro
byad dang/ bden pa mthong ba dang/ rig gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang/ grub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang 2 gnas brtan ma'i tshogs su
bcad pa dang/ don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde dag gsang bstod de bton to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ras brjod pa rdzogs par mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ra la 'ad skad ces bka' stsalato/ gro bzhani skyes khyod kyis gang nga bdag gse mngon par shes te// mngon par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa'i chos gya nom pa dang
sā na par bsgrags pa legs so legs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ra'adi snyam du sems te } da bcom ldan 'das labadag gi mkhan pos 'phrin gsol
ba smra ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du rage nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom/
ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa rdo can zhes bgyi ba' yul gyi mtha' gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i grongan/ btsun pa skya[W]na chen pa mchis pa
da bdag gi mkhan po 'gasate/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ma/ nyam ngang nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang/
bde ba dang/ nyam nga ma mchis pas bde ba la reg ra ra spyod dam zhes snyan gsel gsaso// gro bzhin skyes dge slong katya ya na bde bar gyur cage/ zhu ba lnga dag kyang rgyas par
brjod pa na de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gro bzhane skyes ra ga ngas zhu ba 'di lung bstan pa'i dus la ma bab
lci kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du zhu ba zhus shage dang/ der khyod kyi zhus pa lung bstan pa'i dus la bab pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das nang sar sngar bzhongs nas/ dge slong ba dag
'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go zhes bya ba'arir du ste/ gro bzhin skyes
nab phyi ba rasi/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// btsun pa rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yulargya mtha' na gnas pa zhes bargya ba'i grongan/ btsun pa ka tu an chen pa mchis
2 ba de bdagag mkhan pe lags te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la zhes bya bas/ bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ zhu ba lnga pa gang du spang ba'i ltung/
byed kyi bar brjod pa yang rgyas par gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste yul mtha' 'khob rnams su 'dul ba 'dzan pa dang/ lnga'i
tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang/ rtag tu khrusakhyab dang/ mchil lham rami gcig pa 'chang bar bya ste/ rim gnyis pa ma yan/ rim gsum pa ma yin no// gal te
zad par gyur na lhan pas btab ste bcang bar bya'o kob bcang bar bya'o// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos bskur pa tshu rol nas spags la/ der ma phyin na gang pa yang
spang ba'i ltung byed du ma gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa zhe bar khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' 'khob rnams su 'dul ba 'dzin
da rung/ lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la/ dbus na gang lags/ mtha' 'khor ni gang lags/ nye bar 'khor shar phyogs na la kha ra
shang 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong med pa// de'i shar phyogs na la kha ra tshapatshang zhes bya ba'i tshal de na rebasas// de phan chad na mtha' 'khob bo/ lho phyogs na 'dam bu can zhes bya
ba'i gling yodapa reṭis rol na 'dam bu can zhes bya ba'i chu bo med pa de na dbus so// de na chang na ma tha 'a 'khob bo/ nub phyogasan bram ze'i grong kul
dang/ rna ba'i ko ba dag yod ded na de bas so// na phan char na mtha' 'khob bo/ khyang phyogs na u kala'i zhes bya ba yod de re na dbus sa// da phan rgyud na mthu' 'khob bo/
dge slong rnams we tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunapa tsho dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris las ni
zhag bgyis na/ las da'i rnam par smin pas phyug la// nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba'i rags dang/ rin po ches smras pa'i rna cha rna ba la thogasangashing btsas la smanas mthong
zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa de mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa dge slong dgagro bzhune skyes rna ba bye bar nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su nas bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhanyer
dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dag rnams kyi tshe lo ni khrithubapa na/ wā rā ṇā si'i grong khyer du sten pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ 'ge rten du sgra rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// rta rāṇā sa'i grongan khyo gshug gnyis mang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas 'od sungs
las skyabs su 'gro ba da nga/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so// gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzod
nas rda nga pa lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ rgyal po kri kes de'i mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las kho ra khor yug tu dpag

tshad gang tsam la 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig khyer du bcu gnas / de la zhag cing gags pa dag slar batsos pa'i phyire grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba gang yin pa de dag ras/
mchod rten de la phul lo// gang gatsho rgyal nga kra kesha nas de'i bu legs skyes zhes bya ba de rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang/ de'i blon po dag gas dpyanyung gsashagi lul lo// des blon
pa rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyad kyis nga la dpya nyung ngu zhig phul/ pa'i yul nas dpya ma 'du 'am zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gsasmras pa/ lta dpyade las 'du ba ga la
mchis/ lha grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba gang lags pa de dag ni/ rgyal po yab kyis mchod rten zhige cing gogs pa slar bcos pa'i rgyur bzhag go/ gal to lhas gnang
na dpya de bdag cag gas dgum mo// des smras pa/ shes ldan pa'i semab kyis gang mdzad pa de ni tshangs pas byas pa'o// don brgya byin gyis byas pa'o//
de dag gis bsams pa/ gal te lhas ma gnang na bdag cag gis ce nas dpyade dag rang 'du bar ma 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam nas/ de dag gis sgo bcad de bzhag pas/ phyin
chad bca' 'du ba chad do// mchod rten de mang zhig cing gogs par gyur pa dang/ khyo shug de gnyis rgas par gyur pa na/ mchod rten de nyid la phyi bdar byed cing 'dug go/ byung
phyogs nas ded dpon zhage zong thogs nas/ wārā ṇa sa'i grong duphyin pa dang/ das mchod rten zhig cadegogs par gyur pa de mthong ngo// des mthong nas yab yumamachod rten
'di su'i legs zhus dras so// de gnyis kyis slas pa/ ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi yin no// sus bgyis/ rgyal po khrigs// rgyal po kri ka res mchod
wārtan zhug pa dang gogs pa slar bcos pa'i phyire phul ba cung zad med dam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ phul ba med de grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nasadapya 'du ba gang dgamachod rten de zhige
pa dang gogs pa bcos pa'i phyore phul ba las/ rgyal po kri ko nongs nas/ de'i sras legs skyes zhes bya ba de rgyalasu'i la bzhi g nas/ des dpya 'du ba de bcad pas mchod rten de
[d]/ zhag cing gogs par gyur to// des rin po ches smras pa'i rje ma ba las phul nas de gnyis la byin te smras pa/ yab yum rin po che'i rna cha' das mchod rten 'di zhig cung gogs pa rnams
chos shig/ bdag na mthong rnams 'gyur te 'ongs nas phyis kyang sbyin no// de gnyis kyis de btsongs nas/ zhes mchod rten de zhage pa dang gogs pa sar bcos skra kha ge na ldeg go/ de
nas rus zhigen ded dpon gyis zong bsgyur nas spogs khyer te 'ongs so// des mchod rten de lta bas ma ngoms pa zhig tu mthong ngo// mthong sakyang de re zhange rab tu dga' ba dang dung ba
skyes te dras pa/ yab yum khyed kyis sbyin pa cung zad ma byas sam/ ri gshis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gas skyonape rung zad kyang mabyas te/'on kyang lhagam yang yod do//
de rab tu dang ba skyes nas/ de la ca lhag pa dang gzhan yang phul nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti cher byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa dang/ nor mang ba dang/ longs spyod che ba'i
gsasu skye ba dang/ chos 'di lta bu thob pa dang/ ston pa 'di lta bu kho na mashes par byed kyis/ ma mnyes par m byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// dge slong dag 'di ji
snyam du sems/ ded dpon gang yin pa de ni gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye bar 'ad 'di an te/ 'das gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten la bya ba byas te/ smon/
lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa dang/ nor mang ba dang/ longs spyod chab ' regis dang/ rin po ches smras pa'i rna cha rna ba la thogs bzhin du
btsas shang/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sumadu byas// 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs
dang shugs mnyam pa// stobasamanyam pa/ brtson pa mnyam pa 1 ma mnyam pa bar s pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi/ ma mnyes par ni ma yin no// dag slong dag de lta bas na
las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams ni dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams ni 'dren ma ane na// dge slong dag de lta bas
nalas gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams n spengs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyad kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// btsun pa tshodang ldan
pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris las ci zhig bgyisan/ las da'i rnam par smin pas mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la ngan song dag mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
'das na la ngag gi las rtsub posmras pa de'i las re'i rnam par smin pas mthong ba'i chos nyid la ngan song dag mthong ng/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu
rgyal khyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' roban bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa nye dga' dge 'dun gyi gsar bu yin pas de gral rims kyis khri ldeg pa zhig thob pa dang/ de
zhig gis dogs pas bla 'og ma bsgyur bar nyāl lo// des bsams pa/ bdag zhe dga' in na khro la yang chags sam/ gal mul cha'am/ khram brjes na zhe dga' zhes
bya pa'i mang mang ma 'dogs so snyam nos } de nang par sngar langs te/ yul ko sa lu'irgyal pogasalargyalagyi drung du song ba dang/ des re la smras pa// btsun pa nye dga' byon pa
legs sa// byon pa legasas// ngag btsun pa te dga' bde bar gzims sam } ra smras pa/ gsus po che khyod rjesnyam du sems/ ji ltare bdag mal stan rim pa brgyad la
nyal bzhin/ nye dga' yang de bzhin snyam mam/ kho bo dge 'dun gyi gsar bu in pas/ kho bo kral rims kyis khri ldog pa zhig thob ste/ de zhig gis dogs nas kho bo bla 'ogakyang mi
sgyur bar nyal la// btsun pa lta raga' mal stan rim pa brgyad po 'di 'dra ba brtags pa lags sam } legs par brtags pa'o// shin tu brtags pa'o// gang du bkag/
tsus bkag/ gal te brtags pa lags na dbulargyas/ snom la bzhud cige/ zhe dgas smras pa/ gsus po che ke sa la'i yul rnams kho bo dang nga ngam ci/ gtsug lag khang du
ku/ skyob la byin cig/ des de ma ma brgyad byin te/ de la bzhes na mal stan rnams khyer bzhisan khri khyer nas de dag srung gi dbus nas dang ba bram ze dang khyim
bdag de dgags mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dros pa/ shes ldan dag dang lha'agazims mal gang du byed/ ltas dgas smras pa/ nyid kyi pho brang du'o// gzims lam 'di gang
du khyer/ zhe dgas smras pa/ 'di dag ni bdag gis thob bo// shes ldan dag dge sbyong na dga' ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis dbyen sbyo ngam/ ci zhis de dag smod par byed } gzhog
phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do// de gtsug lag khang du song nas/ gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ phyag dar byas nas// ba'i lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs te/ gnas mal
bshams nas 2lar bsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyogasater byon no// de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi
gnas malas 'dra bar mchis gzigs su gsol/ da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag thog ma 'de du rul ba sbed pa na skyes bu gti mug na/
rdo dgor yin par dge par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de na dge slong dag khāstan mazen po dang/ khri stan chen po la nyal pa yin no// de lta bas
na dge slong gas khri stan mthon po dang/ khri stan chen po la 'dug par ma bya'o// 'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gas khri stan mthon pa dang/ khri stan/
chen po la 'dug par ma bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas lasogs pa dag slong ga dege 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/ de khri stan mthon po dag bsham por
brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sngon rol 'de du son pa dang/ des stan mthon po dgashom pa de mthong nas/ des de la smras ba/ khyim bdag stan 'di reg na dege slong dang 'tsham pa
man gyas sdus shige/ sa re dag bsdu bar brtsams pa na } bcom ldan 'das kyang rer gshegs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na me khyen bzhin du rmad pa yin pas/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pakun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo khar ci zhige khyed/ bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag 'das chen po la 'os pa'i gdan dag shom nas/ bdagags
khyim bdag stan 'di reg na deg slong dang 'tsham pa ma yan gyi/ 'di dag sdus shuge ces bsgo ba dang/ de da dag sdud pa lags so// kun dga' bo thams cad la 'byor pa med pa ma yan gyis
kun dga' bo khyim bdag stan shom pa pa ma zlog cig/ de lta bas na tshe ga nang ste/ khyim du khri stan mthon po la 'dug par bya'i kā ror 2la rar na mo bya'o// gtsug lag khang du nu'e dug
param bye/ nyal bar angamakhye ste// 'dug gam nyal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// lha phyogs nas dge slong chos gos gsum pa gzhan zhig
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du 'ongs pa de'i pags pa 'ge ding ba bzang po de'i rags mthong nas/ des de la smras pa// bsad som pa pa ga sa pa kho bo la bya gi/ kho
bo bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o// des smras pa/ btsun pa de dag la gro mang rung ma 'gro yang rung ba dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshol du btārengs so//
bsod snyoms pa khyod ji snyam du sems }nyo rags 'o na 'dra ba'i regs pa red par mi nus snyam/ nga'i rid pa la ltos shig btsun pa zhi dga' btsun pa 'a 'ga' khyod kyis gang gi phyir nus pa

da' phyir kho bo ma 'bul lo// g.yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsalargyal gyi de lang gaspyan byed pa chen pa zhes bya ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bashes pas/ re ra' gan du song ba na/ ji tsam na ses
ka'i dus su be'u bkrashangabakra ba dag byung ngo// dasabedugacigag rgyab tu byugs pa dang/ chen pos smras pa/ btsun pa de dga' khyod be'u 'di'i ma'i 'o ma gsal bar bzhed dam tsa/ des smras pa/
de yang 'dod med kyi khed 'dra ba'i rags pa dge slong gang la yod pa sems las chung ngus bde bar dge ba'i phyogs la rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// chen pos smras pa// btsun pa te dga' ba la/
lcal pas mjalagyis bzhud cige/ de song ba dang/ chen pas phyugs rdzi la bsgo ba/ pe'u 'di gsad la khyod kyis pags pa khyer te btsun pa nye dga' la phul cige/ das be'u de bsad nas
pags pa khyer te song ba dang/ ba debe'u la gdung bas skad 'byin tsang rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba las/ de rgyal byed kyi tshul du zhugs pa dang/ ba de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na skar
'byon 'dug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmadapa in pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lasmus pa/ kun
dga' ba rgyalakhyed kyi tshelargya sgon/ ba 'ar rtse'i phyir skad 'byin cing 'dug/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das btsun pa nye ragasaba'u dang pags pa 'tshol
ba'i slang du 'gums su stsalabs/ des na bde rgyal byed kyi tshel gyi sgo na 'bu'e lags sa// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal// zhes dmags gang ci byung ba de na reg slong dag
ko lpags 'chang ba man gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gas ko lpags bcang bar mkhye'o// khasangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
gas ko lpags bcang bar ma bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gas/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ga dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan
ga/ drangs na/ khyim bdag des gdan gzhan bsham du med pa na/ des ko lcags kyi gdan dag bshams par brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang
par sngaralangs te/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang/ des khyim bdagar ko lpags kyi gdan dgashomapa mthong nas smras pa// khyim bdag stan 'ad dag ni dge slong dang 'tsham
wā pa ma gyis 'dadig sdus shage/ des bsdu bar brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'dasakyang der gshes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmar pa yin
pas/ sangs rgyas bco[W]ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la rmas pa// kun dka' ba 'ad ce zhige byed/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsal ra/ khyim
bdag des gdanugazhan bshum du ma 'byor nas drag ko lpags kyi gdan bshams pa dang/ bdag gas khyim bdag gdan 'ad reg na deg slong dang 'tsham pa ma an gyis/ 'di
dag sdus shig ces bsgo nas/ da stan 'di dag sdud pa lags so// kun dga' bo thams cad 'byor pa med pas/ kun dka' ba khyim bdag stan shomapa ma zlog cige/
de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ khyim du ko lags kyi ston bshams pa la 'jug par bya'o/ nal bar ni ma bya'o// gtsug lag khang du su 'dug pa'i ma༄/ nyal
'bar ma kha ste/ 'dug gamaṇḍal na gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i lab 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs
sa/ tshe dang ldan pa nga yin da'abu rab tu byung tshun chad nas rtag tu nad bu can nyid du gyur to// gnyen dag de'i drung du son pa dang/ des de dag la chos bshad do// de dag
gis tshe dang ldan pa pa len ru'i bu las chos mnyanenus/ bud med kyi gam du 'ongs ta smras pa// 'phags pa pa yin da'i bus sbrang rtse bumer ba lta bur chos snyan dgu zhig bshad de/
de dag gis smras pa/ khyed cag gis tshe dang ldan pa de las chos mnyan pa na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no// khyed cagakyang nyan 'dod cing/ bdag cag der
mchi bar ngo tsha'o// gal te 'phags pa bdag cag gi 'daregshegs te chos bshad na/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin du mnyan no// de dgags slas pa// bdag cag 'phags pa
pa lin da'i bu'i thad du sol zhu bar bya'o zhes/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa pa la'i da'abu gang na ba der song sa 7na nas smras pa/ 'phags pa pa lan da'abu bud med dag chos thos par 'tshal
la das smras pa/ kho bos bkag gom tsa/ nyon cig/ de dag gis smras pa// 'phags pa bud med dgamar ngo tsha lags so// gal te 'phags pa pa lan pa'i bu de nyid du gshegs/
[s ]grubya// chos bshad na/ de dag nyan par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo na bas rlung bus na 'gro ma nus so// de dag gas smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhon pas
gshe/bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dag slong rnam kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
wā ma/ de lta bas na rdzas su gnang ste/ bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa pa lane da'i bu bzhon pa la zhon nasalhan
cig gnas pa dang/ nye gnas rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing dong pa drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'gro ba pha gi su zhage/ de dag gire smras pa/ } mkhan po yin
ci bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pa rjes su gnang ngam/ rjes su gnang ngo// drug ste rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa na/ shākya rnams shin te bzhon pas rkang pas
gro ma nus te/ gcom ldan 'dus kyis bzhon pa rjes suganang ngo snyam nas/ de rnams kyis gser dang } dngul dang/ bai ḍūrya dang/ shelargyas khra bor byas shāng/ padma bzhin du bya dor byas pa'i
bzhon pa dag nye bar bzhag ste/ re dag bzhon pa la zhon nas srang ga rebs nas lag pa bsgrung ste/ thom re dang khyim bdag rnams ṃ la nad med par gyur cig ces zer zhing dong ngo// de dag gis smras pa/
'a bzags pa dag ci 'a ni deg khacom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang pas/ rjes su gnang ngo// de dag gas kha gas pa dge sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa man no zhes smras pa'i skabs de bcom ldan
'das la/ dag slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa// nyes dmigs gang chubyung ba de ni dege slong dag bzhon pas 'gro ba man te/ de lta bas na dge slong gas bzhon
pas 'gro bar mi bya'o// de nyid rtas dmagis su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba na le nyas te/ rgas 'khogs nas nyams chung ba dang/ na ste
sbyor la brjod pa'o// dge slong rnams ljongs rgya zhing dang ba las/ de dag gas chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ chu rgal ba na dbus su phyin nas 'gro ma nus pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das
la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gi sa rgyal bsab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bslab
par bya'o zhes gsus pa dang/ drug ste rnams kyis chu bo a dzi'i ba ta la na mang rgyal/ tshur yang rgyal ba dung/ jatsam na phyugs rdzi bud med dag 'ongs pa na dgags mthong nas smras pa/ sring
mo tshur shog/ khyad bdag cag gis bsgral lo// de dag gas de dag bsgral bar brtsams pa na/ de dag gsade dag ga yan lag dang nying lagadag la regang/ de dag gis de dag bsgral nas smras pa/
ka bya/ sring mo dag ang tshur shog/ kho bo cag gas phyire ang bsgral lo// da dag gis smras pa/ 'dags pa dag bdag cig yan lag dang 'ang lag khyim thabs kyang ma
zarig na/ khyed cag gas rag par byas pas bdag cag slar g la mchis/ de dag smad par byed/ 'khar byed/ khazer bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsal
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ sa ramages gang du byung ba de na dge slong dag bdu med la rig par byad pa yan gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis bud med la reg pa'i m bya'o// reg na 'gal

tshubs na du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis bud med la rag nga/ra mi bya'o zhagasungs pa dang/ grong khyer gyi ma rnams skyed mos tshal la dga' bas/ de rnams skyed mos tshal du dang/ bud

med cig chu len du song ba las da 'byed de chusakhyer ro// nga tshol du song ba'i ma des dge slong dag mthong nas/ 'phags pa dag gas bud med chus khyer ba zhig gzige gas sam/ mthong lta chus khyer ba pha
gi an no// pha ga de da ltar sha lajug/ nyin thog thagattatshul lta zhing 'khod dam zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dbyung ba bya'o// gzhan dag na re thong zhig ces zer na/ gal te mthu med pa mnan gtang bar bya'o// gzhan chag g.yo ba med par gyur te/ de dag bya ma spungs pa la khas bub tu bzhag nas bor te dor ba

kazhi/ dang de was zos so// des bor te 'gro bar mi bya'o// de dag chags pa skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la/ gang rag kha ton zlos pa de dag ni kha ton//
byas shage/ bsam gtan pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis na yid la byas shig/ dro yel tu dogs de na ba lang rdzi dang/ phyugs rdzigang dag 'bod pa de dag la gtang nas 'gro bar bya'o// drug sde dag gis
bdag gzhan zhig gi ba'i mjug mal bzung nas/ ba'a'o ma zad zad du phur rkyal tshur rkyal to// des ba la dris pa/ da rang ci'i phyir 'o ma med/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa drug sde dag gis zhes bya ba/
nas ༔ da da par byed/ phya bar byed/ kha zer bar byed ces bya ba zhus gongs ma bzhan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gsanga'i mjug ma las bzung ste rgyal bar bya'o/

bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ba'i mdzugam las bzung ste rgyal bar ma bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong chu rgal ba dag tshig glang po che'i mjug ma nas bzung ste/ 'gro bar kha dod pa dag padma
par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mjug ma can lnga'i mjug ma las bzung ste 'gro bar bya ste/ glang po cang shes dang/ rta cang shes dang khyu mchog dang/ ma he dang/ ga yag

ga'// 'on kyang rgyal pas rgyal bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal pas rgyal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ drug sde dag rkyal pa bud med dang skyes pa nyal po byed pa ri mor bris shing/ ra rnaltar
bya dor byas pa dag byas pa dang/ de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gas mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'anatsalags/ de dag gis smras pa// bcom ldan 'das
kyis rkyal pa rjes su gnang ba'o// 'a ra gsang dag sbyong khyed cag na 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis dbyen spyi dam/ ca zhis de dag skyed par byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams
kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge sbyong gas rkyal pa bud med dang skyes pa nyal po byed pa ra i'abras dang/ padma ltar phyi dor byas pa dug bcang bar ma bye'o// 'on

kyang skyal pa ga nyis bcang bar bya ste/ rtsis bskul pa dang rgyal skya'o// khyim bdag mgon med khrus sbyin gyis 'khor gyi khyams shig brtsigs pa dang/ chos mnyan par dag slong shing gi mchil lham gyon pa
dag lhag nas/ de dag gi shing gi mchil lham gyis sa gzhi bstar ba brud cing klogs par gyur to// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang par sngar langs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
du 'ongs pa des mthong ngo// mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa rtsa 'dare mdang gsum rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang dgongs btab bam/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po na ma min/
med kyi/ dge slong shang gi mchil lhamagyon pa dag cig 'ongs te/ de dag gis 'di ma rung bar byas so// de med par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang
nga com ldan 'das kyis rab gongs pa/ nyes dmags gang 'byung ba de na dge slong dgashing gi mchil lcam 'chang ba man gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis shang gu mi lcam pa cang bar ma khye'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing gzhechil lham bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ khyim du dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de dgags mchil lham 'dam
gyisarlan par gyur pa'i skabs re bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim gru nang du shing gi mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/
dge slong ma dge 'dun rnams la/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gas bshade ga mchil lham dgaphul ba dang/ dge slong rnams kyis ma blangs so// de dag bags smras r/ 'phags pa dag gang gi ro
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba re'itsho mu stegs can rnams sbyin gnas su gyur tozhes bya ba nas gong bzhin rgyas par brjod par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gling bar bya ste/
blangasan sa dge 'dun gyi snamarya sa 'am/ chab khung sar gzhag par bya'o/// 'dul ba 'di// bam po nyi shuganyis pa/ sdom la

smyug ma'i lo ma gro bzhin dang/ rjes su gnang dang bsrung phyir dang {de bzhin bsegs su btang pa dang// rtsed mo rnyed da sbug na// bcom ldan 'dasagyis dge slong gis shing gi mchil lham lanang bar mkhye'o zhes gsungs nas/de dag skya ga
lo'i mchil lhama'achang ba dang/ de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smyug kha'i mchil lham bcong bar mkhya'o/ de dag rtsa zhu 'i mchil lham 'tshadad
a dang/ de 'de nyes dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rtsa mun dza'i mchil lhamabacang bar mi bya'o// de dag srad bu'i mchil lhama'achang ba dang/ de nyid las dmas su gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab stsal pa/ srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar ma bya'o// dge slong dag dreg gis btab ste de dag shub byung bas/ koba'amachil lham rlan par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan
'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dreg gis thebs pa gang yin pa des srid pu'i mchil lham bcang par bya'o// gang ba

tshogro bzhin skyes bya ba rinu pa rab tu byung ba de'i tshe/ de'i rkang mthil la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spu sor bzhitsam yod pa ro drug sde dag gis mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dag gis smras pa// dga'

ba te dga' ro zhig mar sar gyi gong bu 'dra ba 'di gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la rab tubyung nas ci zhig byed ces smras pares thos so// des thos nus nga rgyal skyes te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i
drung du song stapanas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa// btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la ting nge 'dzani yun ring du gnas par gsungs pa gang lags/

[z/ ]tshodang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes 'ag pa sa thob pa yin no// de bsa'i ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du sen gnas 'chag sa bcas so// de 'chag pa na spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra pa sor bzhi tsam po dag kyang zad do//
da'i 'og tu pags pa rdol/ de'i 'og tu khrag byung ste/ de ji sridi 'chag sa'i mgo gcig nas gcig shes su song ga bar du/ de'i 'jug sa'i mgo gcig na yang bu dag khrag 'thung la gnyis pa na ang 'thung
ngo dachos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa ni/ dus dus su nas chu ngor rgyu ba spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ skabs 'dir na sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing gshegs pa yin pas// tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i gtsug lag khang gang na ba de ra gangshegs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grwa bzhin skyes bya ba
zhishu pa'i 'chag sa gzigs so// gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na mkhyen bzhin du rmid pa ane pas/ mkhyen bzhin du mad ra/ sa ngasargyas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo gi ga tu brtson pa'i chags 'di dge slong gang ga in/ gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i lags so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/
gro bzhin skyes bye ba'angge'us rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o// ramaganyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum ba ma yin no// gal te rdol par gyur na lhan
pas btab ste bcang bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba tsho dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba zhi gu ra gang na ba der song
ste sonanas tsho dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyas byeb zhu pa la 'an shin tshes smras so// tshodang ldan pa shes par gyis shage/ ston pas khyod la mchil lham mi gcig pa rjes su gnang

ste rage gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo ci dge 'dun thams cad la'am/ 'on te bdag 'ba' zhig la/ khyod 'ba' zhig la'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo

ston pa'i bka' ni mo gcog na/ gal te bdag gas bcaan gzhi des bdag la tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa dag e ma'o// glo bzhin skyes bya ba tire'u pa rab tu byung nas ltog po zhig red do// gang mang yul tsam/

thun mong ma yin pa dang/ bla grung po chab dun gyi tshogs spangs te rab tu byul/ dad mchil lhag thug gi ba tsam la chags pa lta zhes gleng bar gyur te/ ri lha yod kyi gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag las ltos te/ dge
'dun thams cad la rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis de bzhin du bcang bar bgyi'o zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'a das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyas par gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ de lta bsan rjes su gnang ste/ grorazhin skyes bye bti shu pa la ltos nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis ramagacig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya ste/ yi gnyis pa ma yin zhes rgyas par sbyar ro// bcom

ldan 'das kyi spyan sn gzhu rgan zhugs mchil lham can gzhan zhig 'chag bar byed pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de la 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong phar sang nga'i spyan snga nam/

'jug gi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag re zhig 'jage rtan thams cad kyi bang thang dang 'dres pa'i ston pa gang yin pa/ ston pa ra'i nyen thos rnams kyang 'di/
ltar myur ba myur bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i brtul zhugs ma spyod na/ nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang bral bar gnas pa'i lta smos kyang sa degos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag mchil lham 'chang ba yan te/ ri lta bas na dge slong gis mal lham bcang bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis dge slong gsamachil lham b.rung bar ma bya'o zhes gsung

pa dang } gar mkhan gzhan zhig rab tu byung ba de'i chu snod chag nas/ darkang pa bkru ba'i gnas su rkang pa bkrus nas kha'i nang du chus bskang ste/ rma bya'i 'gros su song ba de drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas/

de rnams kyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa dag rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed kyis/ rol ma'i sgra bya'o zhes de rnams kyi las rol mo'i sgra bya bar brtsams so// de rnams la dge slong dag gas smras pa//

tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe mi grangs pa byed dam/ de rnams kyis smras// 'di la mgras su zhig yod/ khyed kyis rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed pa mthong ngam zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/
dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyenang zhin du rmad pa gzhi bas/ mkhyen bzhi durmad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ dge slong de la rmas pa// dge slong khyed kyis bsam pa ni gigis de lta bcus/ btsun pa gnas mal srung ba'i slad du'o// dag slong 'di gnas mal srung ba'i phyir de lta bur byed pa la/
[% ]ltung ba med do// de lta bsan rjes su gnang ste/ gnas mal srung ba'i phyi rom gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o// rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rami gsum pa ma yin/ gal te rdol bar gyur na/ lhan
bgyis btab ste bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dmagag pa'i mchil lhamabacang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig la khyim bdag gnyisig dad par gyur to// de nang par sngar
gyi langs te mchil lham medasaramanyan yod du bsad snyoms la zhugs so// de mchil lham med pa khyim bdag des mthong ngo// mthong nas smras pa// 'phags pa la mchil lham mam chis sam/ tshur spyon lham

shā mkhagyi drung du bzhud/ mchil lham cig 'bul du stsal to// de lham mkhan gyi drung du song nas/ de lham mkhan la smras pa/ rkyenang 'phags pa 'di la mchil lham rig phul cig ces bsgo nas song ngo// de'i

tshe dge slong rnams dang/ shi ba rnams dang gnyis kyi phyiramachil lhamaram lag go pa dag byas so// dge slong de yang dang yang du lham mkhan gyi drung du song yang ma byin no/ dus gzhan/zhage na khyim bdag des
yang dge slong mal lham med pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang smras pa/ } 'phags pa khyod la lham mkhan gyasamachil lham ma phul lam/ khyim bdag lham ma khan la bden par smra ba dkon par khyod kyis//
azes sam/ ang dang yang du song yang ma byan no// des smras pa la/sa pa tshur spyon med du bzhur/ des de khyim du khrid nas kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas te/ rim pa mang po can gyi mchil
lham 'ge zheno// dge slong ga ེ smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzas su ma gnang ngo// des 'phags pa bsnams te bzhud la rim gcig pa'i mchil lham mdzod la gsol cig/ das de
khyer te gnas khang du song nas/ des de dang gru blangs te shing drung du nga dug nas dral bar brtsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyag gsanor khyon nas/ dge slong ci byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rim pa
mang po can gyi mchil lham bkagan/ bdag la 'chi pa mang dag 'di lta ba grub ste/ rim gcig par bgyis la bcang bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du/ a ma'i nga'i nyan thos rnams

la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dgagis rim pa mang po'i mchil lham ster ba lta snyam du dgongs nas/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ mchil lham rami pa mang po can khyam pa'i dman ma yin pan chen bcang

bar bya'o// tsho dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus te zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyae mchil lham dam pa mang pe cakhyim pa'i dman a ma'i pan chan bcang par bya'o zhes gsungs na/
[r g]// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na khyim pa'i dman ma lags par brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor tha na gom pa bdun nam brgyad bgos par gyur na ang yin// gleng gzhi ni yangs pa

can no// de'i tshe angs pa can na 'di lta bu'i mchil lham dag byed de/ 'di lta ste// khrag ga/ tshagi tshig/ sa chem zhes zer ba lug ru bas/ byang chub kyi shange ba/lo ma lta bu khra bkar sha pa na lnga

sa༔ ra ba dgabyed do// drug sde dag gas mchil lham dag gyon pa zhig mthong nas/ de dgags rnying pa rkang pa'i mthe bos mnanas ltag pa mas phul to/ khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di phul bas sems kyi rgyan dang/ sems

kyi yo byad dang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshigs dang/ don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyade thob par gyur cag ces byas nas blangs pa dang/ phyogs kun tu 'phags pa dag ni lhamar lta bu 'phrog gi zhes sgra grags sa// gan mo
zhig gas rnag pa zhage 'ongs pa dang de la des mchil lham zhige byon nas/ 'phags pa dag mchil lham 'phrog gse// jigs kyang phyogs par ma 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o// bsad/

snyoms pa zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa des mthong nas de khyim zhig tu zhugs so// de yang de nyid du zhugs pa dang/ de khyim de nas khyung nas khyim gzhan zhigetu zhugs so// bsod snyoms pasakyang de
da du zhugs pa dang/ des smras pa// 'phags pa khyod don ci'i phyir kho bo'i skyes bzhin du 'brang/ tsamachil lham 'da' phrag par bzhed mod/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyi mchil lham kho bo ma 'grog ste//

'on kyang kho bo bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'phrog kyang rung ma 'a grog kyang rung ste/ 'on kyang phyogs kun tu 'phags pa khyed cag mchil lham 'phrog go zhes sgra grags so
zhes pa 'i skabasad bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'ad snyam du dgongs te/ rnas dmigs dang ba byung ba den/ dge slong dag mchil lham khrig khrageg ces bya

ba nas/ de lta bas na dge slong gi mchil lham khrag khrig zer ba bcang bar mi bya'o zhas bya ba'i bar rgyas par sbyar ro// de lta bu bcar bar mkhya'o// dge slong gsod lta bu'i mchil lham bcas na 'gal tshabs can du
'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong rnams mal lham gyis rkang pa'i bol rma byung ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ khyed cag gi zhabs kyi pol ja zhig nges
ma byung bar gyur/ mchil lham gyis so// ci khyed cag gas bgegs su bcangs nas ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i bskabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong
rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ bsegs su bcings nas panang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi rdung le'i ri la 'gas

pa na rkang pa'i mthe bong ma byung ngo// de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ khyed cagag zhabs kyi mthe bong che zhig gis rmabyung/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa na'o/ khyod cag
gas mchil lham gyi rtse mo sbu gu na ma bcas sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis ba sel ba dang/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis mchale lham gyi rtswa mi spu gu can bcang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs pa na rkang pa'i tshong pa rma byung

ba[0f14 ]bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed cag rnams kyi zhabs kyi zhing pa rtse zhig gis rma byung/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las de bas phana'o// mikhyed cag gas mchil lham gyi
rnying pa sbu gu can ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsel pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ nage slong gis mchil lham gyi rtong pa sbu gu can bcang bar bya'o/// sdom la/ mgul chad dang na yu'i zung lham// kha khrod dag tusgrog gu can// dom gyi
pags pa gnang ba dang// sbyang ba 'brong bu chu gla 'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong rnams rtswa'amyu gus rkang po rma byung ba dag/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong/
nas smras pa/ 'phags pa zhig khyed cag gi zhabasaci zhig kas rmabyung/ rtswa'i myu gus so// ci khyed cagags lham mgul chad ma bcasaṃ sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su mganang ngo zhes
pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ lham mgul chadabacang bar bya'o// gang gi tshe tsā'i/

myu gu char skyes pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa de bas kyang rma chur byung ba/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras r// khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhige gas rma byung/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
rtsi'i myu gu rag cher skyes da sa bdag cag gshing pa de bas kyang ma char byung ngo// 'phags pa rnams su khyed cag gis lham mu'u thungam bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes
pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ lham u'u thung bzung bar bya'o/
gang gi tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pas ser skya na gnas pa'i shākya rnams kha btāg pa na/ de dag las kha cige nub phyogs su dong ba nas/ kha gi bal yul gyi bar du dong ngo//
mnan yod pa'i don mthun dgazang thogs tu bal yul du lhags pa dang/ de dag gis de rnams mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag gang nas da 'dir lhags/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
mnyan yod nas so/ bdag cag gaganyen 'phags pa kun dga' bo yod na/ lan 'ga' yang 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'dar 'ongs tebadag cag la kha gtam ma dris so// de rnams kyis sas ra/
bdag cag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song la sbyin par bgyi'o// da rnams kyis zing rnams bsgyur ba'i zing dag khyer te mnyan yod du lhags nas/ de rnams kyise btsags/
pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi gnyen bal ulan mchas te/ de dag khyod mthong bar 'tshal la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni gnyen la gdung ba yin pas/ de gnyen dgabalta

ba'i phyirebal yul du song ba las/ de lhags pas lag ri dang rkang pa ser kha cung ba nang/ de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ padma'i 'dab ma ral ba bzhin du khyod kyi lag

'gaṃ pa dang shang pa ba zhig gis ser ga byung bar gyur/ rigs smras pa lhags pas so// khyod kyi gzhan dag na lham sgrog gu can ci ste 'chang/ khyod ci'i phyir mi 'chang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i
skabs de bcom ldan 'das la// dgeslong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ ul kha ba can rnams su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar bya'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yul kha ba can rnams su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags/btsun
pa ji tsam gyis yul kha ba can du brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor gang na snod du chu 'khyag pa yin no// dge slong gzhan zhig la rten pa zhagi dad par gyur nas/ rngon pa des dom lpags ga rān
ba ga sleng ra la phul ba dang/ das ma blangs so// des dge slong ring phyi bzhin 'brang zhing smras pa/ 'bags pa keg['' ]sa la pa khyod la 'bul gyis bzhes shig/ dge slong dor blangasas//
bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas chom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rgyud pa saṃ nu ngas// mkhyen bzhin du rmidade/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis//

tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos zlas/ kun dga' ba dag slong 'o na'i phyi bzhin du rngon pa pha gici ste 'phrang/ btsun pa rgya pa de/ dom phrugs shig red nas/ des dag slong 'o ni la stsal ba las/ da gleng/

gis de ma blangs pa dang/ rtson pa re dag slong 'o na phyi bzhin 'brang zhing mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dgud de rngon pa dad pa can ni dkon te/ gal te brgya 'am stong zhig dang phrad na thams
cad gsar pa yin pa sa/ de bas na gal te tshon pas don lpags de na blang bar bya'o// blangs nas dri gtsang khang gi sgo 'am nang tsa' 'og tu gdang bar bya ste/ dom lpags thams cad na mig la phan no//
dge slong gzhan zhig gi mchil lham rol nas/ de lham mkhan gyi drung du song ste sen nas smras pa// bzhun bzangs bdag gas mchil lcam ral ba brgyus te bdag la byin rug/ lham/
mkhan gyis bsams pa/ shākya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams ni rjen pa med par 'chol gyis/ yun ring du brgyungs pa dang rang gi blo slar log par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ 'gas pa bdag brel gyis sang spyin
thu/ cig dge slong de yang dang yang du lhama mkhan de'i drung du song yang des brgyangs pa dang/ re mdza' bshes dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de la smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa tsa di na khyod kyi/
bras sbyar ba'i khyim med dam 'on te gnyen gyi khyim yod/ des smras pa/ don bdag gi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yang med/ gnyen gyi khyim tshang med med kyi/ bdag gi mchil lham ral nas/ bdagags de la brgyus
ta byin cig ces smras na de brgyang saso// des smras pa/ 'phags pa lhama mkhan la bden par smra ba dkon par khyod kyis ma khyos sam/ 'on kyang bdag gis shesakyi/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su
gnang na/ bdag gis brgyus te khyod la spyan no zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ dge slong gang zhig shes pa
yod na/ des gang du gzhan gyis mthong na mard par ma 'gyur ba dben pa'i phyogs su bdug ste brgyu bar bya'o// de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang gi rgyus ga/
des smras pa/ ci 'ad de bzhin du brgyur rung snyam mam/ de la re zhig smyung bu dang/ dra gri dang/ 'bring bu yang dgos so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang zhagishes pa yodon/ des sbyang bu dang 'breng bu na bcad bar bya'o// dra ga ni bcang bar mi bya'o// ko lcags gyi gzhi rdzogs so//
sman gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom la/ sman dag dang na sde can dang// rgyal po'i khab dang 'od ma tshol// shing mkhan ade tsa nang ga la// kam ba la dang sngon rgyal po go/ gzhon nu/
'phel rang nud pa dang// gtam du gyur dang sder bsdus pa 'o/// sdom la༔ sman ni rjes su gnang pa dang// tshil dang ga zhan pa mgi sman dang// smyon pa dang ni de loned// nam gru dang
ni skyur khu 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyakun dga' ra ba na bzhugs go/ de'i tshe dge slong rnams ston ka'i nad kyis thebs te/
de rnams ston ka'i nad kyis btab bas/ skya bo bseng bsang par gyur cing 'di la dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ na bas nyam dmas par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmad
pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas ra/ kun dga'u bo ba'i phyir da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo bseng bseng par gyur cing rid pa dang/ nyam chung/
bdang/ rna bas nyam dmas par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di rnams ston ka'i blo nad kyis btab } 'di rnams ston ka'i blo nad kyis btab pas/ skya
bo bseng bsang par gyur cing 'de po dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na rjesasuganang ste dag song
dgis sman sa ser bsten par bya'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis dge slong gis sman sa ser bsten par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i ng/ do rnams dusasu zas yin pas nus su sen par//
byed kyi/ dus las yol bar ston par ma phyed pas/ de rnams skya bo bseng bsang bar gyur cing 'di pa dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ na bas nyam dmas bar gyur to/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
wā mkhyen bzhin du smon pa yane pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo ngas dge slong gis sman sa ser bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/'on kyang

daltadage slong da rnams skya bo bsang bseng par gyur cing 'di pa dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ rna bas nyam dmas par gyuratam/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus kyis dag slong
rgyugs sman so sor bsten par bya'o zhag gsungs pa/ 'di deg dus su 'tshol ba lags pas dus su bsten par bgyade kyi dus las yol bar mi bsten te/ de'i slad du skya bo bseng bsang par gyur nga ro de la
dang༔ nyam chung bodang/ bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur lags so// kun dga' bo ri lta bas na rjes suganang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis sman rnam pa bzhi po dus su rung ba dang/ thun tshod du rung
dang/ zhag bdun pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba so sor bsten par bya'o// de la dus su rung ba ni lde gu dang/ 'bras chan dang/ zan dron dang/ sha dang/ snum khur ro//

chu shing rgya shug dang/ daashwad u dum wa ra dang// pa ru shakagun 'bu dang// brgyad pa mang na 'bra go min/// thun tshod du rung ba ni btung ba rnams brgyad pa shing togatso tsa'i btung ba dang/ cha gang

gi 'bras bu' nga chung ba dang/ rgyu shugag btung ba dang/ ashād tha'i btung ba dang/ u rum wa ra'i btung ba dang/ pa ru sha ka'i btung ba dang/ rguna' khru'i btung ba dang/ 'bra go'i btung ba'o// mag

bdun pa namar dkar dang til mar dang/ bu ram gyi dbu ba dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sha kha ra'o// 'tsho pa'i bar du bcang ba na/ rtsa ba'i sman dang/ sdong bu'i sman dang/ le ma'i sman dang/ me tog gi sman

dang/ 'bras bu'i smon dang/ thang chu lnga dang/ thal ba lnga dang/ lan tshe lnga dang/ bska ba lnga'o// de la rtsa ba'i smanan gla sgang dang/ zhu dag dang/ ung dang/ sge'u gsher dang/ bong nga dkar dang/ gzhan

ang rtsa ba'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pazas kyi don du ma 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// sdong bu'i smanan tsan dan dang/ dbyi mi dang/ 'ug pa dang/ thang shangedang/ sle ches nang/ skyer ma dang/ gzhan yang snang

bu'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du ma gyur ba gang yin pa'o// le ma'i sman na pa to la'i lo ma rang/ bshaka' lo ma dang/ rnam pa'i lo ma dang/ kesha ta ka'i lo ma dang/ sab ta ra nang lo ma

dang/ gzhan yang le ma'i sman gyi nang du gzhogs pa zas kyi don du ma 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// me tog gi sman nu me tog lnga pa/ bshaka'ai tog dang/ me pa'i me tog dang/ rtad ka'i me tog dang/ sha ta'i mi/
[/ ga dang/ padma ke sa ra'i me tog dang/ gzhan yang me tog gasman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du ma 'gyur ba gang yane pago/ 'bras bu'i smanan gar ra dang/ skyaru ra dang/ ba ru

za ra dang/ na le sham dang/ pa pe lang dang/ gzhan yang 'brasa'u'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du ma 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// thang chunydza naring kun dang/ su dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ spra

tshal dang/ drod sman no// de la shing kun narishing kun gyashing ga theng chu'o// sa rtsi ni shing sa la'azing chu'o// rgya skyogs na rgya skyegs so// smra tshilan spro tshal lo// drod sman ni de dag las gzhan pa'i

shing rnams kyi thong chu'o// thal ba lngagang zhan/ nas kyiwal bar ng/ nas kyi phub ma'i thal ba dang/ shang sa rdzag ka'i brel ba dang/ tilargya zel ba dang/ shinge 'ba' zhig ka'i thol ba'o// lan tshwa lnga

gdung zhan/ rgyam tshwa rang/ lan tshu smug po dang/ kha ru tshwa dang/ lan tshwa dang/ rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa'o// bska ba lngagang zhan/ a ma'i bska ba dang/ nīm pa'i bsku ba dang/ 'dzam bu'i bska ba dang/ shi ri de ga'i

bska ba dang/ kosham pa'i bsko ba'o// de la dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang/ thun tshod du rung ba gang mān pa dang/ zhag bdun pa gang mni pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba de dus su rung ba dang 'dres
paragyuran/ dus su spyad par bya'o// dus ma yin par longs spyad par mi bya'o// dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang/ thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang/ zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i bar

du bcang ba gang yin pa re/ gal te khrun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur na/ thun tshod la yongasasu spyad pa bya'i/ thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o// zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang/ brko/

ba'i bar du bcangabagang yin pa de zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyuran/ zhag bdun du spyad par bya'o/ zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o// 'tsho ba'i bar du b.rung ban 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar

byanegyis brlabs nas yongs su spyad pa ra bya'o// byin gyis brlab pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ zanam zas pa'i mdun du lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te/ dge slong zhig ga mdun du 'dug nas 'ad skad ces
brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/bdag ming 'di zhes pa'i sman 'di dag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi don du 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlab bo/ de
bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod do// 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba byin gyis brlab pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyun tshod du rung ba dang/ zhagabadun pa mang byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gleng gzhi/
ni mnyan yod na'o// des dge slong gzhan zhige rlung nad kyis thebs nas sman pa'i rlung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab na sman sbyin ga/ des smras pa/ phags
pa tshal sten cig dang/ khyod sos par 'gyur ro// dge slong gis smras pa/ bzhan bzangs kho bo 'dre yin nam/ sman pas smras pa/ dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan/
'gyis ni sos par ma nus so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman ba na re/
dge slong khyed kyi sman 'ad ani te/ gzhan gyis na ses par ma nus so zhes smras na tshal bsten par bya'o// dge slong dag gis ma shes nas/ sman pa la dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed
cag gi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis/ da kho na'i drung du bzhud la zhus shoge/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dag slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//

tshel lnga so sor bsten par bya ste/ lnga gang zhes na/ na tshil dang/ sprul pa dkar pa'i tshele dang/ chu srin byis pa gsod kyi tshaladang/ dom tshul dang/ thag ga tshol lo// chil 'di la dus ma an par
btsos pa dang/ dus ma yin par btsugs pa dang/ dus ma yin par spyan len byed pa dang/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na longs spyad par mi bya'o// dus su btsos la dus ma yin par btsags/ dus
ma min par de len byas/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na longs spyad par mi bya'o// dus su btsos/ dus su btsags la/ dus ma yin par sbyin lan byas/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabasan
spyad bar mi bya'o// dus su btsos/ dus su btsags/ dus su sbyin len byas la/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na spyad par ma byo'o// dus su btsos/ dus su btsags/ dus su byon len byas/
dus su byin gyis brlabs na til mar la spyod pa bzhin du zhag bdun du spyad par bya'o// de nas dge slong des rgyal longs spyad nas sos par gyur to// des ses par gyur pa dang/ des rgyal gyi lhag
ma dag bar ro// ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhige de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas/ de yang sman pa'i drung du song nas smras pa/ bzhan bzangs kho bo la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab kyis sman ston gi/

des de la yang tshil bstan pa dang/ de dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa khyod kyis tshale spyan pa kho bo la yang sman pas bstan na/ rmil lhag pa lta cung zad kyang yod dam/ des smas pa//
bdog bag pa las bdag gsad khor ro// ma legs pa zhigabyas so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gisi'i
longs spyad pa'i lhag ma bor bar ma ste/ 'on kyang bcang bar bya'o// arage slong tshul 'chang ba'a kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ tshil 'chang ba'i dge slong gis tshul spyad pa'i lhag ma

dag slong gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// gal te mabyonen sman khang du gzhug par bya ste/ su 'dod pa des blang bar byago tshel 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs nas
par byed na lag la tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig gzhan pa'i nad kyis lus nas sman pa'icud du song// bzhin bzangs kho
ka ka kha an pa'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig sa smras pa/ 'phags pa bsku ba snyan cig dang khyod chos par 'gyur go// bzhin bzangs su kho bo' dod pa spyod pa yin nam/ des smras pa/
dag gling khyod kyi sman 'di an// gzhan gyis na sos par ma nus sam pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dag slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du/ khyed kyi ston pa na zems can
mkhyen pa an pas/ de kho nas mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bas ba ni lnga na// a ma'i bska ba
zhes bya ba sagong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong des bska ba dag lde gur byas te lus la byugs pa las rma mched nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phye ma bya'o// dge slong bdag gas rlon pa la
btang pas ri lub gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskam par bya'o// de dgags shu ma la bsams pa dang/ mthu nyams par rgyunas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
nynyo nyi ma la bskam par ma bya'o/ de dag gis grab ma la bskams pa dang/ 'on kyang rul bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma'agrib mas bskam par bya'o// dge slong ga sa ska pas
lus tsubs nas bkrus te bska ba'i bya ba me da do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pas ji tsa mchog gi bar du rul nas khrus bya'o// bkrusanas slar yang bska bas bskus pas bska ba'i
bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong des bska pas bskus pa dang nad zhi bar gyur to// des bska ba lhag ma bor ro// tshim na dge slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas/ de yang sman pa'i
byung du song ste zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du ste/ kho bos de na bor re// ma legs pa zhig byas se zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ sa ban pa 'chang ba'i rig slong ga kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste// bska la 'chang ba'i dge slong ga sa pas ba spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slongs slong ba re la sbyin par bya'o/ gal tam gyi
na sman khang du gzhag par bya'o// bska ba 'chang ba'i de slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa mang dag par blangs te 'jug par ma byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyura'o/ gleng gzhi ni

mkhan med na'o// de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhag mge nad kyis thebs nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste// bzhin bzangs kha bamagi nad kyis thebs par gyur na kho bo la smanasnyacig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa
mige sman so sor stan gi dang sos par 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs ci kho re 'ad pa longs spyod dam/ 'phags pa khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyisan sos par ma nus sa zhes bya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan
'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa na re/ sman 'ad yin te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na/ mig sman bsten par
kla khya 'o/ dge slong dag gis mgo smanagang bsten par bya ba ma shes nas/ de dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang/ des smras la/ 'phags pa khyod de kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/
gyis zhes bya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das ra/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mag sman na lnga ste/ me tog gi mig sman dang/ khu ba'i mig sman dang/ phyema'i
mig sman dang/ ra lu'i mig sman dang/ btsag yug snum gyi mig sman no// de nas dge slong des mig sman de bsten nas sos par gyur to// des mgo smanagi lhag ma gar ba phag tu bzhag pa las de chud zos

ma par gyur to// ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas/ des kyang sman pa la dris pa dang/ des de la lar mgi sman de nyid bstan to// de nas slong de'i drung du song nas/ tsho dang ldan pa kho ba mang

mig nar gyase btab par gyuran/ khyed la mgasman gyi lhag ma cung zad yod dam/ debatsal bar brtsams pa las ma rnyed nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan l mig sman de bdog bdog ste bzhag pa las/ de stor te
zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis mig smanagar bab bab tu gzhag par ma bya'o// ngas

mag smana'achang ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ mge smana'achang ba'i dge slong gis mgo sman rnams so sor phye la gzhag par bya ste/ me tog gi mgasmanan snyedakyi nang du'o/
khu ba'i mgi sman ni gab tsho'inang du'o// phyi ma'i mgo mnan dong bu'i nang du'o// lu'i mgi sman dang btsagag lug snyam gyi smanan skye'u 'am zum par skud pa sa bcas la zung nga la gdags par bya'o//
yig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gling gzhin mnyan yod

'o/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa bye ma skyes sems 'khrugs te skyes par gyur nas/ de de dang de dag tu 'phyan pa ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong ste/ de dag gis smra sa la/ shes ldan dag 'di

su 'du zhig yin ༔ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag choge mo zhig gi'o// de dag ga gis smras la kākya'i sras kyi deg sbyong mgon med rnams kyi nang du rab tu ma byung na/ da ge nyen rnams kyis gsos par gyur ba

zhig/ ces ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong bye ma skyes kyi dpyad sman pa la rjes la byos shig/

sman pa cung du dong nas bzhin bzangs rag slong zhige 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dgasha rjen ratshaladu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs de ༔
'dre ānanan/ 'phags pa de'i sman 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par ma nus so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ra/ gal te sman pa na re de'i sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zeran sha rjen pa sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dag gas de bzhin du phyin pa dang/ de za ma/
ba btub go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig las kyis bkab kha sbyin par bya'o// de dag gis byin te phyin ma thag tu ras phye ba dang/ des lag pa la reg pa mthong nas de zhi ba log
pas skyags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ med la ras dbye bar ma bya ste/ de lta med kyi bcar ba bza' bgatsang zhing bsod ba dag mdun bzhag nas/ gang gi tsho lag pa bkrus pa de'i
de dpe saṃrabya'o// da sos par gyur pa dang/ de re 'de la sred par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gagang ga tsho sos par gyur
pa de'atsho/ bslab pa ji ltar bcas ba bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya'o// longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 'o// gleng gzhin rgyal po'i khab na'o// tshe dang ldan pa li ling

dang bu gang gi tsho rab tu byung bar tshunachad rtag tu na ba dang/ zug gzeramang por gyur dang/ de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyi snyatsha zo ji lta/ sa smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa dag rgyun du na
ba dang zug gzer mang bos theg pa'i skabs med do// gnas brtan khyod sngon gyi zhogi 'chang bar byed/ des smras pa/ smanagyi mchan khug go/ de ci'i phyir ma bcang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su
mtsham gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyi se gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gso sman gyi
mchan lug bcang bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis lcab dang/ me tog dang/ sdong bu dang/ 'bras bu'i sman rags pa dag de'i nang du bcug pa dang de dag rul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de dag sbam pa 'am bam por byas te zung nga la gdags par bya'o// de dag rul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus dus su bskam par bya'o// de dag gis nyi ma la bsams pa dang/ de dag
mthu chung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'a ma la bskam par mi bya'o// de dag gis grub ma la bsams pa dang/ 'on kyang rul bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

grib ma la bskatshapar mi bya'o// de dag gis btang nas dong ba dang char pa dang rlung byung ste ma bsdus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsdu bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu bar bya'o zhes
gsungs pa dang/ de dag gis gus bsdu ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim pas so// khyim pa med na dag sbyong sa so// dge sbyong med na dge slong nyid kyis bsdu bar bya'o//
dge slong gso bsdus pa rang 'dres par gyur nas/ 'dres so zhes ma zos pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so sor phye nas longs spyad par bya ste/ de la khyad par mkhye'o// ngasan ba dag
la rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams da ma na ba'i gnas skabs na spyad par ma cu'o// spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na go mi dang/

ldan pa nam gru gar yang som nyi zi bas/ de'i ming nam gru sem 'a can nam gru som nyi can zhes bya bar grags so// de snga drosham thabs bgos/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan yod du bsod snyom

la zhugs te } de rim gyis bu ram byed pa'i grong du phyin pa dang/ jatsem na'abras phye dang bu ram sbya bar khyen pa mthong nas/des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu ram 'bras phye dang ma smra zhige// 'phags pa spyi bar
bgyid pa gzhan 'ga' mkhyenazham/ kho bos spro ba gzhan yang ma shes med kyi/ bdag cag dus ma yin par longs spyad dgos so// 'phags pa dus su 'am rus ma yin par gsel gang rung ste//
da'i spyi ba na bad lags te/ gzhan gyis na ma 'brus so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rād pa na des ma zosas// de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang ' gnas dag gis smras pa/
slob dpon dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig red kyis las spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/ bzhan bzangs zas dang 'drasas// de de dag gis kyang langasam spyad pa dang/ da rnams pa dge slong gzhan dag

gse smras pa/ tsho dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhagi b.rīs na tsa ste las ma spyod/ re rag gis smras pa/ mkhan po'i zhal nas bad ces dang 'dres so zhes gsung ngo/ dar rnams kyis kyang longs
[s]ma spyad do// 'khor phal po che dang dge 'dun ral las kyang phal de ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zas
sa zas kyi bye ba ma byed pa na ma rnyed pas 'byung lung yongs su dag ras longs spyad par bya ste 'a da la 'gyod par mi bya'o
thabs/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan yod du bsad sems la zhugs te/ rim gyis srang zhig tu phyin pa dang/ ras spos 'tshong zhig phye la reg nas bu ramal reg par byed pa mthong nas/

la bag mar mazer/ dus ma yin par yang bdag cag gso les spyad dgos so// des smras pa/ na ngas sas pa/ banyen bzangs lci la ro gnas bu ram la ragalaram/ rtsa sa na lengs ma smad de/ lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gos smras pa/ lha dang//
ba su zhig mchis/ dus gzhan zhege na dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed pa dang/ des longs ma spyad do// lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ slob len dge 'dun gyi bca' ba khu
ram dag rad na ci ste ma gsal/ des smras pa/ bzhan bzangs 'ad zas dang 'dres so// de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang/ de rnams la dge slong dgags smras pa/ tshanang ldan pa dag dge

'dun gyi bca'ab bu ram zhig red na tsas ma zo/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po'i zhel nas 'di zos dang 'dres so zhes gsung ngo// de dag gis kyang phangasam spyad do// 'khor phal po che ra dang dge 'dun
00/ la las kyang phal ches longasam spyad pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kha/ zas kyis zos kyi rgyal/
mid pa mared kyis/ khyim pas yongs su dag pas longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ gleng gzhin mnyan yod na go tshe dang ldan pa nāra'o te rlung nad kyis thebs nas/

tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams la/ tshe dang ldan ra nāra'i bu la bdag rang gi blos ramegro na lan mang du byas mod kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dras/ ma la ra na sman pa la dri'o snyam nas/

ra sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs tsho dang ldan pa shā ri'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i ched kyis thebs par gyuran da' smonaston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa sgyur khu'i zhing duyan cha snyol la gsol ga dang nges par

'gyur ro// des skyar khun rnyed na lan tshwa med nas/ de lan tshwa btsal bar brtsams ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa pa pa len pa'i bus smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gel gyi bu kho po pa lan tshwa rwa gang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar

phyin gyi se brlabs po zhig med kyis/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na sbyin no zhes smras pa/tshorung ldan pa shā ra'i bus thos nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khe bo 'di snyam du

sems te/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dus su rung ba dang/ longs spyad par ma dbang ngo snyam mo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal ba chen pos gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal ba/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ma dbang ste/ dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang/ thun tshod du rung ba gang yan ba dang/ zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ gal/
ta dus su rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la/ gal te byin gyis kyang ma bslabasan/ dus su rung ba dang 'dres bas dus su spyod bar bya'i ]dus las 'das par spyad par bya'o// thun tshod du rung ba gang yin

pa dang/ zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang/ 'tsho ba'akher du bcad bgang yage ba ni/ gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la/ gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dras pas thun tshod du spyad par bya//

thun tshod las 'das bar spyad par ma byug/ zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bya ba gang yin pa de/ zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyuran zhag bdun pa dang 'dres pas/ zhag bdun du spyad par bya'o/

zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o// 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de ni/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyad par bya ste/ gzhan du spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur go/ sdom pa rdo tshon sha dang
gzhang 'brum dang/ rlung nad can dngagang po nga// mes cani dang khi'i ra ko/ sprin chen bya ga rnams yin no/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ulaka gnas ljongs rgyu zhingagshegs ba na/ wārāṇ

sar byon nas wā rā sa na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi gsan bzhugs so// wārā ṇas na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so// de'i chung ma ni sde chen ma zhes bya'o//
ga/ de chung ma dang bcas te dad pa bzas ba dge ba'i bsam ba can yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi zhes bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ wā rā ṇa sar byon nas/
wārāṇāsan drang srong smra bar dag sakyi nags na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim du lan mang du spyan drangs/ zhal zas gsol na
yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs kyis/ ma la bdag gas dbcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du e byad thams cad kyis bstabs par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan

tsha 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyos gas gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par
mdzad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod khar mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu roga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang ma gsung ngo// de nas khyim bdag sde chen bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la/
mngon par bstod de/ rjes su ya nga nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesal so
to/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang/ chos gos dang/ bar shod snyoms dang/ gzims cha dang/ snyan spyad kyi skyon sman dang/ yo byad rnams 'bul/
na bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la cang ma gsung ba gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag sde chen bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes
su ar ngas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gzhis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cigaṃ tu khyim bdag sde chen gyis zla ba
gsum du na bza' tshos gos dang/ bsad snyoms dang/ gzims cha dang/ snyan gses kyi rkyen smanarang/ yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur kho na byas so// khyim bdag sde chen gyi kun tu spyod pa nanang bar
sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rnams la lta bar byed pa las/ dge slong nab/ nad tshabs cheb/ sdug bsngal ba'and pa gzhan mi yod pa da la/
sman pas sha khu 'thungs shageces bstan to// de nas khyim bdag sde chen dge slong de gang na ba der song stesen nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dris pa/ 'phags pa sman pas tsa bstan/

des smras pa/ sha khu 'thungs shige go/ de nas khyim bdag sde chon rang ga khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa/ slob da pon che ge ma zhes bya ba la sman pas sha khu 'thungs gis bstan gyis sbyor la
skur ci'o// des bu mo zhig la ni bskur nas tshong dus su btang ba las/ de'anyin margyal po'isras bltams nas de dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ sus kyang srog gcad bar mkhya'o//

gang gis srog bcad na chad pas chod par gcad do zhes bsgo'o// des rin gyis kyang tshong rus su sha ma red nas/ de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag khyaebadag sde chen la rgyas par brjod pa dang/ tshes
zla bdagasde tshan gyi chung mas bsams pa// sangs rgyus la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag gis mi byad thams cad kyisabastabs na/ gal te dge slong gi snyan med pas sha bar gyur nam legs

sa zhes de snyam du dpyad nas/ gri rnon pa blangs te khyim du zhugs nas bsla'i sha las bcad de bu mo la byon nas/ bu sha bda'u bar byas la 'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer tsage/ des de khyer nas
dge slong gis longs spyad pa las sos par gyur to// khadzul ba gzhi/dbus pa shu rtsa gsum la// ge slong des 'di ltar bdag la khyim bdag ga chung a
paṇṇaṃ 'dase rang gshas bsnyen bkur byas par rigs de 'di snyam dusems te/ bdag dad pas byin pa longs sbyar nas glos phab ste 'dug pa na rogisapa ma yan gyis/ ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba
dang/ ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang/ mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam nas/ de brtson 'grus brtsams par brtsams te/ de brtson pa dang/ bad pa dang/ las
rtsa ba byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo' cho lnga la gso ba rang ma g.yo ba 'di yod gi ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
nyid du zab rgyas gnan nas/ nyon mos bzamasar spangs/dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas/ dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/
nam mkha' dang lag mthapo dumanyam pa'i sems/ ste'u dang tsan dan du mnyamar/ ga pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbyabs rngala'ang ragi par ng/ mngon par shes pa dang/ sa a dag par rage pa thob pa/srid/

pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur lta lo rgyab kyis phyogs ba/dbang po dang sha dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyisaṃmachod par bya ba dang/ brjod par bya ba dang/ mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// skabs der
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams namamkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma rnyed pa ma/ rnam badzami mkhyen pa cung zad kyang ma mnga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/
lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas/ dge slong gatshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ dge slong gi dge 'dunas mdun gyis bltas te/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi khamigang na bder gshegs te byon nas/ dge
slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen ba bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyim bdag gi chung ma sde chen ma ma snang na ga re//
bcom ldan 'das spyod lam mi zlog bas lug na mchis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshapa'i ba ga ren khes mas gyis ma khyab pa yin khas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

zla gang gisan rmad mdog 'dra ba dang/ bags ba 'dra ba dang/ spyi 'dra bar gyur pa de ltar byan gyis brlabs so// de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma dang ba skyes tasger byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

༄༅che ba dag ga chung ma 'gi byang chub sems dpa'i sbyangs nyams sumyong bar byed dam/ des tshigs su bcad de gsol kha/ sgrim mi dgos par nga khor ba na/ lus na lin du da bar rgya bskal ba bye ba stong rnams su//

sbyan gnas shan tured bar do gangag/ de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong dge 'dun bde bar gshegs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod ma'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams rang gi lag nas do

shing mi bar byed do// rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang ga khag gas bsgrubs shing tshim bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag btabs te lhung ba zer rgyu bar

gi nas/ snyan chos da kha ba zhig blangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan par phyi'i 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston pa mdzad/

ang dag par ba'i du 'jug bar mdzad/ ang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam thas ru mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag pa bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du zug/
[Bas ]yang dag pa gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gtan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan las gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/ dge slong gdege 'dun gyi gung la
gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyiso/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sha rnams kyi nang na na 'ad lta ste/ mi'ongeshatha chad yin no// da lta bsan dpe/
slong gis mngesha bza' bar ma bya'o// dge slong gso ma'isha zes na ltung ba sbom por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ngas dge brtan gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dag

'dun gyi khe nas brtan gyis dge slong gse sha 'dim par byed na/ 'di ci'o ga zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te dge 'dunagyi gnas brtan phyage ma sdobs na/ gnas brtan g shas pas dra bar bya'o/ dge 'dun gyi gnas ban
gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par ma byed na 'gal tshabs can du bgyur ro// dge slong thams cad the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcodapa

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa khyim bdag sde chen gyi mchis brang gis rang gireshas dge slong 'dal bsnyen bkur bgyis la// dge slong 'das kyang sde chen ma la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
