dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ra ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ ji ltar 'das 'das pa'i dus na yang/ dge slong 'ad la rang gi seshasabasnyen

bkur byas te/ 'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de ngashane tshu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung bzhi'i dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wā rā ga'i

bongan khyami bdag sde chen zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i chung ma sde chen ma zhes bya'o// jatsaman bram ze tshogs 'don du bcug pa gzhan zhige bram ze'i bu lnga brgya tsam la/ bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go/ de la khyim

zla bdag sde chen dad pa skyes te/ des de 'khor dang bcas pa la me byad thams cad kyis bstabs te/ khyim bdag sde chen gyis bram ze de la khor dang bcas pa la bkur sta kho na byas so// khyim bdag deng kun tu spyod ban ning

par sngar langs te/ nad pa rnams la lta bar byed pa las/ jatsaman bram ze'i khyi gzhan zhagen ba/ sdug pa sngal la/ nad tshabs che bar gyur nas/ de la sman pas sha khu 'jungs shage ces bstan to// de nas khyim bdag

kaṃ sde chen bram ze khye'u gang na ba der song ste/ son nas phyag byas te dras pa dang bram ze'i khye'u khyod la sman pas tsā resan/ des smras pa/ ]sha khu 'thungs shage la// de nas khyim bdag sde chen khyim du song nas chung

mal smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u che ge ma zhes bya ba la sha khu 'jungs shig ces sman pas bstan gyis de sbyor la skur zhige/ des bu mo zhig la ni bskur te tshong dus su btang ngo// de 'de kyinyone ma rgyal po'a'i btsas nas

das dril sgrogs su bcug ste/ sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o// gang gse srog bcad par gyur na/ des tshan pas chod par gnad do zhes bsko'o// de nas tshong dus su ran gyis kyang sham red do// de nas bu mo

des de ltar gyur pa des/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma la rgyas par smras pa dang/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsams te// bram ze 'khor dang bcas ba 'di la bdag cagags yo byad thams cad bstabs na///

gal te bram ze'i khyi ngu zhig sman mer pas dus byas bar gyuran ma legs so zhes de ghan du dpyadazhas/ gnon pa blangs te khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas/ bslarig las bcad de bu mo la tsani nas/ bu ga 'di lu bar

byos la bram ze'i khye'u chage ma zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer gi/ des khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u de longs spyad nas sos par gyur to// bram ze'i khye'u des bar ltar bdag la khyim bdag gi chung mas rang g.yegs bsnyen
bkur byas par rig nas/ de 'ad snyam du sems te/ bdag rar pas byin pa yongs su longs spyad nas/ padag glos phab ste 'dug pa ni rig pa ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang/

ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang/ mngon sum du mkhyusal mngon sum bya ba'i phyir bdag gis 'bad par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de zha ba'i phyogs su song ste/ mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so//

dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba'i rlung ma gang ane pad na/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma 'di yod mnano// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa re na/

dge slong 'di nyid yan te/ de'i tsho mang 'das dge slong ni la rang ga shas bsnyen bkur byas te/ 'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// da ltar yang 'di deng slong 'di le rang gi
thubya// shas bsnyen bkur byas so// dge slong 'dase kyang 'di la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas go/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las
zla ga de tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gzhag pa yin/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi gcig tu dkar ba man/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma mazhego/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las
gcig tu go nag pa rnams dang 'dren ma na spangs la/ las gsume ]tu dkar ba la bstsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i

tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po cho tsho dgu kha tag go/ mu ge'i dus byung bas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis glang po che'i sha bza' bar brtsams so// drug sde'i dge slong dag pa rdo sham thabs
gos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so// tshim na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gas glang po che'apisha phru bar bcug ste 'tshod cing 'dug pa'i khyim der de dag zhugs pa
dang/ khyim bdagug chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud phyage/ de dag gis smras pa/ phrub 'di'i nang na nga tshod cing 'dug na/ 'phags pa 'di ni gleng pa tsho'i

ka las sa na/ ci khyed cig kyang glang po che'i sha gsal lam/ kho bo cag ni 'tshob khyed cag la rag las pa ni pas/ gal te khyed zan kho bo cag la yang byin cig/ de dag la phul nas/ de dag gis lhung bzed

[po/ ]kyi sner bkang ste phyir byang ba/ dge slong gzhan dag cig bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de dag gis mthong ngo// mthong nas dras pa/ e ma drug ste dag lhung bzed kyi snod khengs tsa in/de dag gis smras ra/ glang

bo che'i sha cung zad red do/ su khyed cag glang po che'angesha yang za 'am/ tshe dang ldan pa dag mu ge'i dus byung ba la/ gal te gzhan ma red na rtsa kho bo cag ltogs te 'changom/ zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan
'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po'i gling pa tsho dgu kha tagal/ gal te khyed kyis glang po che'i sha zos pha rgyal pos thos na/

khyed la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ mi dang/ ma ma yin pa gzhan dag kyang med pas/ 'phags pa dag glang po che'i sha za ste/ des na bdag gi glang po che tsho dag la rtog ge zhes sems par ma 'gyur

ma/ dpag slong dag de lta bas na/ dgoslong dag gisaglang po cha'angesha longs spyod par ma bya'o// longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// glang po che'i sha ji lta ba bzhin rta'i sha yang de dang 'dra'o/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa na drang srongal ra ga'i rdzong 'gram na bzhugs so// yul tsam pa'i klu dad pa bzang ba dge ba'ibasam pa can de chos brgyad dang gcu ban la gnas nas byung ste

yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas/ gnas snang bor lus chen por byas te/ lus btang nas 'dug cing 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa dag pa cung zad kyang gnod pa 'am skrag par ma byi do//
mu ge'i dus byung ba las malta ba'i mi phyugs rdza rnams dang/ lug rdzi rnams dang/ rtswa khyon rnams dang/ shing thun rnams dang/ mamagyis 'tshob rnams dang/ lam gol bas 'tsho bami/

rnams kyis/ klu'adesha la dum bu dum bur bcad nas longs spyad par brtsams sa// drug sde'i dge slong dag rdosham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos dag thogs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ rdzatsim

na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis kru'ag phra bar bcug ste 'tshod cing 'dug pa'i de khyim der de dag zhugs so// khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa// 'phags pa dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud cige/ de dag
ga smras pa// phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshod 7 'dug na/ 'phags pa 'dan klu'i sha lags na khyed cag kyang klu'i shagasol lam/ kho bo cag na 'tsho pa khyed cag la rags las pa yin pas/ gal te khyed cag
zan kho bo cagal yang byin cig/ de dag la phul nas/ 'phags pa rnams kyang longs spyod do zhes phal mo ches gnad par brtsams so// de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma 'di snyam du sems/ 'phags pa 'dadeg

kyang klu'isha la longs spyad pas/ skye bo'i tshogs phal mo ches longs spyad na/ bdag gi khyim thab kyis un ji srid cig sdug bsngal mnyags dgos/ bdag gis 'di'i phyir 'ad kho na bya'o snyam mo// de nas tsam pa'i
ku'i chung ma de mtshan mo 'das nas/ kha dog bsags pas bcom ldan 'das gang nab der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis pa mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcigecu 'dug g/ de'i tshe

tsam pa'i kru'i chungamang ba dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzong ga te 'a khor thams can snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas so// tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/
gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi sdum thapa dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsams pa can de tshos bsgyur dang/ bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bstan gnas blangs nas lus btang ste/

mchis la/ 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa rang skyag pa cung zad kyang ma bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dus byung bas las la ma lte ba'i mi phyugs rdza rnams dang/ lugadzi rnams dang/ rtsa thun rnams dang/ ri
thun rnams dang/ lam gyis 'tshob rnams dang/ lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i ma rnams kyis klu'i sha rum bu dum bur bkram nas 'tshalab/ 'phags pa dag gis gzigs nas 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang gsol
bar brtsams so// 'phags pa rnams kyasagasolab de dag gis kyang phal cher bkum zhing 'chol bar brtsams na/ bdag ga rjem thabakyis mun ja grode tsage sdug bsngal mnags 'chol/ kyi ma bcom ldan

'das thugs brtsi ba lta bar bzung ste/ gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag chu'adesha ma gsol bar dgongs pa'i smyo chung zhage bca' bar gosel/bcom ldan 'das kyisaṃtsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la chung ma gsungs bas
de nas tsam pa'i klo'i chung mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungabs gnang bar rige nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gas la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de zhade du ma snang bar gyur to/ des/
bcom ldan 'das re de kyi metshan ma 'das nas/ dge slong gi dege 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa 'de la zhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams

la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdas gsum pa'i spyan sngar tsam pa'i kye'i chung ma mtshan mo 'das nas/ kha dog 'phags pas nag gang na ba der 'ong te phyin nas/ nga' zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/

lho phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogasag ru zhu'adu gnas / rang tshotsam pa'i klu'i rnying ma'i kha dag ga mthus drang srong garaga'i rdzong gi shu 'khor thams cad snang brgya chen pos khyab par byas so// tsam pa'i klu'i rlung

a phyob sa gcig tu 'dug nas/ bal bad skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdagag sdemathub dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can de tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la rang ga gnas nas byung ste/ yan lag rgyad dang ldan

krîṣa pa'i bsnyen gnas blang nas lus btang ste mches la/ 'ag rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang sgrig pa cung zad kyang ma bgyid pa// mu ge'i dus byung bas las la ma lta ba'i ma phyugs rdzi rnams
dung/ lag rdza rnams dang/ rtswa thun rnams dang/ shing thun rnams dang/ lam gyi 'tshob rnams dang/ lag gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur bkum nas 'tshal lo// de dag gas
'tshal ba dang/ 'phags pa dag gis kyang sa sol bar brtsams sa// 'phags pa rnams kyis gsal rtogs zhes de dag gas cher bkum zhing 'tshol bar brtsams na/ bdagag sdum thab kyis an dza srid
cig sdug bsngal mnags 'tshal/ kyi ma bcom ldan 'das thugs brtsi ba nye bar bzung ste/ gang ga phyir 'phags pa dag klu'angesha ma gsol bar dgongs pa'i rgyu cung zhig bca' bar gsol zhes/
zer nasaṃ/ ngas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas tsam pa'i klo'i chung mas nga cang mi gsungabs gnang bar rage nas/ nga' zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de tu'i

du ma snang bar gyur to// gang la da lta'i lha dag kyang kya'i sras kyi reg sbyong rnams ni dege ba'i tshos rnyams pas nyams sazhes smod par byed/ sbyar ka gtong bar byed/ khazer bar byed pa 'di ni bzang pom
yin/ rigs pa ma mne te/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong dag gis klu'apesha bza' bar mkhya'o// zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dhang ljongs
rgya zhing gshags ban rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyalapo'akhab 'od ma'i tshalabya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// ma ga dha' la po bzosbyangs gzugs can snying pas/ bcom ldan 'das yulam ga
rdo'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rgyal po'i khab tu byonanas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tsho bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan
bdagags lan mang du spyan drangs te zhal zas gsol na/ lan 'ga' yang zla ba gsum du a byad thams cad kyis ma bstabasakyis/ ma la bdag gas bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du ya byad
thams cad kyis bstabs shing/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyang dpal yosnyam mgo can s rgyal po'i 'byor pa dang rgyal po'i mthu chen pas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
der song ste phyines// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasags la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcigegasatu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/bcom ldan 'das kyis mgonta'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
gzugs can sāng pa la/ chos dang ldan pa'i 'ogatamagyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
mdzad ra rnan sa grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzani nu bcug/ yang dag par gzesabastod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cungamagasung ngo//

de nas ma ga dha' skyel po bzo sbyang sagazugs can snying po bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pagatstshagacugazar saṃ/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su la
ma sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dgung zlagsum du bsod snyoms dang/ na bar chos gos dang/ gzims cha }

dang dha snyanudapyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnam sadang/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed dbul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mgarlu'i rgyal po bzo sbyang sagazugs can sāng po la mi
gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas mag dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyas gazugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang ma gsung bas gnang bar gnas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gas la mgo
bos phyag byas nas sengang// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig/ mgarā'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos zla ba gsum du na bzang chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims

cha dang/ snyan dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad thams cad dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rim gro kho na byas so// yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi re 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ ma

karma rgyal po bzo sbyang sagazugs can sānge bas yo byad thams cad dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bskabasaso zhes thos so// thos nasakyang 'dasnyam du sems te/ de yang rgyal po rgyal gis spyi bo nas dbang

bskur ba yin/ bdagukyang rgyal po rgyal rabs spyi le nas robang bskur ba yin la/ de'i smon pa'i rgyal po na'atsho byed yin la/ bdag gi sman pa'i rtsel lo rgyun shes kyi bu yan gyis/ gang ga tshe bcom ldan 'das

mnyan yod du byon pa de'i tshe/ bdag se kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge bdun dang thabs cige la abyad zams cad dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu bstabs par bya'osnyam mo/ nga tses na bcom
ldan 'das rgyal po'i khabcu dbyar bzhugs nas/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum 'das nas rmos ga sa byas pa dpaldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/ ltung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor cing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bstas nas mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ ramigyasatstsha zhing gshegs pa

na mnyan yod du byon nas } mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyalapyad kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// kos la'i rtsel po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das yul ko saṃ pa'i ljongs rgyu zhing
gshegs pa na mnyan yod du phyin nas/ mnyan yod du rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig 'dug go/ phyogs ga'i chu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal ba
gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/
rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis mang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gangs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mgasung ngo// de nas ko/
sa la' rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te bla gos phragapa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge bdun dang thabs ga la dgung zla gsum ru rta ba zung chos gos paṇ/ bsod ms dang/ gzaches cha dang/ snyan dpyad kyi rkyen
sman gyi e byad rnams dang/ sman pa 'grel pa rgyun shes kyi bu dbul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi go sa la gyel pa gsal rgyal la rang ma gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas
ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chung ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo// bcom

ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du yo byadathams cad dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bus rami gro kho na byas so// ko sa pa'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal gyi kun tu spyod pa na nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ dge slong nad pa la lta ba saṃn no// tshim na dge slong gzhan zhige gzhang 'brum gyis thebs nas/

de sku babaseng bseng par gyur cing/ rod pa dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ rna bas nyams dmas par gyur pa de/ ko sa la'artsel pagasalargyal rgyas mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir skya bo bseng
paseng bar gyur cing/ rid pa dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ nabs nyams dmas par gyur/ lha bdag gnang 'brum gyis thebs so// de nas rgyal pos sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu la bsgo ba/ dge
slong 'di'i dpyad byos shig/ des lhabaka' bzhin 'tshal/ da ma dad pas des ma byas so// ji tsam rgyal bas yang dge slong de mthong nas dris pa/ 'bags pa khyor rgyan

shes kyi bsarapyad ma brgyas sam/ lha ma'agyas so// de nas rgyal po khros sku rgyun shes kyi bu pho nyas bkug nasabasgo ba/ gal te khyod kyis dge slong 'di'i dpyad byas na de lta galegs/ gal te ma byas/

na khyod kyi dbang thang gcad do// de rang bzhin gyis ma dad pa zhige pas chapa'i khrugasanas/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i phyire lhas bdag gi dbang thang gcodaparagyur ro zhes/ des dge slong dargyal bu rgyal byed
kyi tshol gyi skor bzo bcos byas nas/ de dang de nas mtshon gyi las bya bar brtsams so// de nas dge slong de nyam nga ba dang/ dog pa dad/ gnod pa thob cing sdug bsngal rtsub pa/ tsho ba/ ma bzad
ba/ mde du ma 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas bsams ba/ bdag nyamangab/ dog pa/ gnod pa thob pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta zhig/ skabs de la sangs rgyas dbon
ldan 'dus rnams ma khyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa dam/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ rnam par ma mkhyen pa cung zad kyang ma mngara'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasathugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyag
dngagshegs pa dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi khus/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs der gshegs pa mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang kun nas dkris pa drag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la smras pa/ dge
[c sbyong n mo'i khu tshur shog/ nyan thos tshub phye ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyide nas slar log ste } gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcon/
ldan 'das kyis 'tshub mdzasho/'a di 'anite/ gang gatshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tsho/ zhal nas 'od gzer sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar pa dang/ dkar pa
dag 'byung zhing/ kha cig na 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig steng du 'gro'o// gang dgu thog tu song ba de dag na yang sos rang/ thig nag dang/ bsdus gzhom dang/ ngu 'bod dang/ ngu'abod chen pa dang/
tsha ba dang/ rab tu tsha ba dang/ mnar med pa dang/ chu bur can dang/ chu bur rdolab dang/ so tham tham dang/ kyi ched zer ba dang/ a chu zer ba dang/ utpal ltar gas pa dang/ padma ltar gas pa dang/
padma ltar gas pa chen po rnams su sangs tsha ba'i rems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag lanangesal bar 'bab ba/ klong ba pe sems can dmyal ba rnams gang dag yin pa de dag la ni dro bar 'bab bo//
da nas sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgya cad par dag so sor na bar byas so// de rnams 'disnyam du sems/ shes ldan rag cib dang cag bde nas sha'aphos par gyuratam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes par gyur

snyam pa la/ de rnams dad pa bskyod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo// de rnams kyase sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag na bad nes shi 'phos pa med pa/
gzhan du skyes pa med kyis/ 'on kyang sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can bda'i mthus bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad bor nams seser zhu bar byas so zhes/ de rnams sprular la/

sems mngon par dad par gyur pas/ dmyal ba myong bar gyur pa'i las de zad pa byas nas/ gang du bden pa rnams mthong ba'i snod du 'gyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying tshams sbyong ba bzung ngo// gang dag

steng du song ba de dag na rgyalachen bzhi'i ris dang } sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dung/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshos ras dang/ tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don dang/

tshangs pa chen po dang/ bod chung dang } tshad med da dang/ bod gsal dang/ dge chung dang/ tshad med dag dang/ dgargyas dang/ sbyin med dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ ma rmob dang/ ma gdung

ba dang/ gya nom snang dang/ shane'u mthong dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing tshags su bcad pa 'di ga shas kyang
bsgrags so// brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la gling chen bzhi'i/ 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// gang zhige rab tu bag yod pas// chos 'dul
'dal brtson 'gyur na// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'grug/ de nas 'od gzer de dag gas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jige rten gyi khams rnams cul nas/ bcom
ldan 'das dikyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'gro'o// de lagal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las rnams phung ston par bzher nan/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snyams 'gas su nub par 'gyur ro kha sa

ba'ang ston par bzhed nan de mdun logs su nub par 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur go// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhad nan zhabs kyi rkang
par nub par gyur ro// ya degs su skye bar lung ston par bzhed nan/ zhabs kyi mthe bong nub par 'gyur ro// mare skye bar lung ston par bzhen nan/ zhabasakyi lus mor nub par 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor
los sgyur ba'irgyal por lung ston par bzhadan na/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthal du nub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal par lung ston par bzhed na naphyag g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro//

lha rnams su lung ston khar bzhad na ni/ sku'i lte ba'i nub par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na na/ zhal gyi nang du chub par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub tu lung ston par bzhedanan/
mdzod lung nub par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chu lung ston par bzher na na} dbu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzir de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
skor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthale du nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pakun dga' bas thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa/ 2 kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba ni/
tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur pa// ji ltar gdugs nashar bar gyur pa bzhin// de yas phyogs rnams kutusnang bar bgyis// yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gsolapa//

rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa ma , ]/sangs rgyas gronong mchog ga rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra zul bya rgyu ma mchis par// rtswa lag rung ltar dkar 'dzum ston ma mdzad// de slad bstan pa nyid blos rus
mkhyen nas// rgyalaba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog/ nyan par 'tshal bshen pa po rnams kyis//tho tshom skyes pagasung tshig brtan ba dang// dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol// tshachu'i
ri bo lta bur brtan pa'i mgon// rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum ma nyon// brtan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyana'atshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalag

kun dga' bo de do bzhin te/ de bzhin no// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ang dag par rdzogs pa'i a rgyas rnams nargyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa ma ston te/ kun dga' bosman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes/

kyi nyams shing chud zos par gyur to/ das de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos bkur ba'i gdung rgyud nas bzung ste/ spyod pa skyon mi mnga' bo la branama'i bu zhes smras so// de de nas zhag bdun khrag dron du/

skyags nas rus byed par 'gyur te/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ dge slong dag de lta bsan rgyun shes kyi bu 'am/ rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byed du ma gzhug go//

[dj]gzhang 'brum yang gcad par mkhya'o// 'on kyang gzhang 'bum gyi de pyad na rnam pa gnyis kyis bya ste/ gsang sngags dang/ sman gyase so/dge slong gis zhing 'bram gcod dam/ rgyun shesakyi bu 'am/ rgyun shes kyi bu

'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byed du 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong de rgyun shesakyi busaji ltar gnod ba de nyid kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar byas so// danas blon po dgags/ rgyal po gsal

rgyal la smras pa// lha rgyun shes kya bus naṭicom ldan 'das la yang ban me'i bu zhes mi tusmas la/ dge slong de yang ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar bgyis so// de nas rgyal po che thang du

bros nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag ngas sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu yongs su btang zin gyis ngas shige/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gam lags pa de dgum ci'atshal/ bcom ldan 'das ni

kyisazhag bdun khrag sngon du lcagasanas dus byed par 'gyur te/ lug zhage nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de ltar gyuran pa'i yul nas sprugs

nashage/ de dag gi de smyugs nas yul gnas bcas zhes khyabar phyin to// yul gnas bcas na gnas pa lha rnams kyis/ skyes bu gti mug gang ge'i khyod khams gsum gyi mgon pa la khranama'i bu zhes tshig tu smos

pa khyod/ 'di'i gnas su ga la rung zhes mang du spyas na sabaskrad do// de de nas wā rā ṇṇasare song ngo// de nas kyang bskrad nas yangs pa can du song ngo// de nas kyang bskur nas yul tsam par song ngo// de nas kyang
[b]/// bskrad nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo// de nas kyang bskyar nas shang drung zhige na gnas so// de nas kyang shang la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis bskyed nas/ 'bab chu dang/ mtsho dang/ mtsho'u

dag gi 'gram zhig tu song ba dang/ der yang skabs ma red nas/ des bsams pa 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni re zhig wa dag gis kyang skabs red na/ bdag gi skabs shing drung dang/ mtsho dang/ mtsho'u dag na yang med

do snyam pa dang/ de la gang gis na khrag dron po skyags nas dus las 'das pa de lta bu'i klogazhas dkris pa skyes so// dus las 'das ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su btsad pa dag gsungs pa// ma zhige skyes par gyur pa ya }/ kha nas skar mig byung ste// nyes par smra ba smra tshig des// bdag nyid la na gcod par byed// gang zhig smadu 'os skya

bo bsngags byed cing// bsngags 'os skye ba rnam par smad byed pa// de na kha ya zhes pa gang gis na// bde ba thob ma 'gyur ba'i nyes pa sogs// 'dire na brgyan pas rang gas nor al ba/ 'di ni phung ba cung zad
tsam yin te/ bde gshegs rnams la yod kyis gdug bsams pa// gang yin de na phu ba chen pa yin// 'phags la smod byed lus dang ngag ga las// sdig to byas nas chu bur rdol rnams su// lo ba dag dang
chu bur can du lo/ bzhi khri ge stong gang yanyidmyal der 'gro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ grong rdal mtshams ma bcad pa gzhan zhig tu dgongs

btab nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyan gyis thebs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni reme gro lan

mang du byas nas/ sman ba la lan 'ga' ang ma dras kyis/ ma la bdag gsar ni smon pal dri'o snyam ste/ de sman pa'i rung du gang nus bzhin bangs/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu sun gyis thebasakyisasman ro//

cig/ 'phags pa klu gsam chab mar mang pa stsalab sgol la gsolage/ snyan g das par 'gyur ro// danas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo rang nyid kyis byas te btsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul la// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams n mkhyen bzhin tu rmad pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' ba la rmas pa/ kun dga' po 'dapayani/ des gsol pa// btsun pa bdag gi glo ba
labasams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gas rang gi blos ni rim gro lan mang du bgyis na/ sman pa la lana'aga' mang yang ma dris kyai/ ma la bdag gas da na sman pa la dri'o snyam bgyid nas/ bdag gis
sman pa la smras pa/ de'amachid nas gru gsum chab maramang po stsal ba sgrol la stsol tsage dang/ snyan gadangs par 'gyur ro zhes mchis nas/ de nas bdag gis bgyis te bsgral ba lags sa// kun dga' bo
gang du btsos/ mtshamasakya zheng du'o// gang du bzhag/ mtshams kyi ched du'o// suabatsos/ bdag gse mtshams kyi zhing du'o// kun dga' bo mtshams kyi nang du btsos la/ mtshams kyi nang du
zhag len par longs spyad par mkhya'o/ mtshams kyi ched du btsos la/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du zhag lon pa mang longs spyad par mi bya'o// mtshams kyi phyi rol tu btsos pa/ mtshams

kyi nang du zhag lon pa yang longs spyad par ma bya'o// mtshams kyi phyi rol tu btsos la/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu zhig lon na longs spyad par bya'o// kun dga' bo mtshams kyi nang yang rung/ mtshams kyi phyi
phyi rol tu ang rung ste/ dge slong gsabatsos pa na thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyad par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis btsos pa thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyad par ma
bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhage med pa de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcige
tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu bdug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisakhyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad } yang dag par 'dzani du bujug par mdzad/ yang dag par

gzengs bstod par mdzad/ ang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de rnam grangs du mar zhes khya banas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang ma gsung ngo zhes bya ba'akher du'o// de nas khyim bdag ga de
stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun

[s/ ]dang thabs gtsagisangs ba dag gi sdum par gdung ga tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/ ngo man spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod lags

yin bcom ldan 'das da de'idus la bab par dgongs su gsol de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun snga dro sham thabs dgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogasanas khyim bdag de'akhyo ga la ba der dong ngo// bcom ldan 'das

bsad bsnyoms bzhes nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms bzhes nas rgyu las rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa' khyosan bzhugs te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nad pa la
gzigs par bzhed pa dang/ gnas mal lo gzigs par bzhed pa dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhul ba par bzhed pa dang/ lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang/ nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i
gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa aneno// skabs 'dire na be com ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pas/ bsod snyoms bzhes nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs so//

tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo na bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyomasanod pa yin te/ jitsam na der 'bras chan ma chos pa zhige phog pa dang/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das

snyan gadangs nas ring po ma lon la/ 'bras chan bad ang ma tshos pa zhig pas/ 'digal te longs spyad na skrun slar ldang bar 'agyur sun kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gnang yang/ 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar
'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/ des chu snod blangs te chus btab nas ji srid chos pa de sude du btsos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/

na mkhyen bzhin du smad pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo phyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi 'bras chan mang ba de 'dra 'am/ btsun pa ma lags/ 'on
kyang ma dral ba lags so// 'o na 'di ga la 'ongs/ des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo legs ga legs so// ngas rjes su gnang ba gang

an pa de yang khyod kyis shes sa// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis ma chos pa byin len byos la/ bcos la longs spyad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ma tshos pa byin len byas la btsos

ni longs spyad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis 'bras skam byin len byas te btsos nas longs spyad par brtsams pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'bras chen sum ma tshos pa byin len byas la btsos te les spyod par bya'o// tshod ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ na dang/ sha dag ni kha dog gyur na byin len byas te longs

spyad par bya'o// 'o ma la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi khu ba rnams gang gi tsho lan gnyis lan gsum du bskol bar gyur pa de'i tshe byin len byas te bskol nas spyad par bya ste/ 'dal 'gyod par mi bya'o// 'di las gzhan du

0 longs spyad na ga la tshabs can du 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe grong khyer sbe ma lta bu zhes bya ba na//

khyim bdag 'byor pa zhes bya ba phyug pa// nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yas su bzung bo/ angs shing rgya che ba// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas sa//
des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma langs nas/ de de dang lhan cige rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgar spyod par byed do// de bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus
gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs pa gyur ko/ re zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas/ khye'agazugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas/ da 'o ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu
btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas mang 'gas par byed de/ khye'u 'di'i ming cu'i gdags/ nye dunams kyis smras pa/ khye'u 'di khyim bdag 'byor pa'i bu yin pas/ de lta bas na khye'u'i mnge 'byor
len zhes bya bar gdags so zhes/ khye'u de'i ming 'byor len zhes bya bar btags so// yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas nas/ pa' mong na 'byor skyob
ces bya bar btags so// yang de'akhyi'u zhig btsas te/ de'i ming ni 'byor dgar zhes btagasas// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag 'byor pa nad kyis btab par gyur sa/ dainachu tshig sgrub par smra
ga/ ste/ des na chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar borago/ de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i 'o ma zhage yodapa des bsams pa/ bdagag jo bos thabs brgya stong du mas longs sbyor rnams bsags

na dha de nad kyis thebs par gyur pa dang/ chung mdang bus kyang ar bar bar na/ bdag gis rdzabo al bar dor ba ni bdag la gis pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des sman pa'i rdung du song ste/ ngo bo khyod kyis khyim bdag 'byor

pa mkhyen nam/ shes se de 'bya/ de 'dra ba'i bro nad mig gis thebs te/ de chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor na de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa// chung ma dang bu dag gis kyang yal bar bor ro zhes khyod nyir zer na//

'o na de la su zhuge rim gro byed/ de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi med kyis/ mis kyang sman ni chung ba zhig ston tsagi/ des de'i sman ni in no zhes bstan to// de nas des bdag rang gi rgyugs las kyang cung zad sbyar/ khyal de nyid

nas kyang cung zad nga rkus nas ramago byas te de sos par gyur to// des bsams pa/ bdag gi chung ma dang bus kyang al bar bor te/ 'di ltar bdag gson por gyur pa ni bu mo 'di'i mthu zhi rgyas/ 'di la phan gdags

par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa// bu mo kho lo na chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor ba las }kho bo cung zad cig gson pa de thams cad na khyod kyi drin yin na/ khyod mchog tsa 'dod pa spyan gyis sbos shig

gal te jo bo bdag khyod kyi thugs su 'thad par gyur na/ bdag khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'tshal lo// des smras pa/ nga dang khyod lhan cig 'grogs bam ci byas/ kar sha pa ṇalnga brgya byan la bran pas/

dbyung bar bya'o// des smras pa// de bdag rgyangs bkum par mchis mchis kyang bran mo kho na lags par byas te/ gal te rje'i sras khyed dang lhan cig 'grogs na de lta na bran mer ma 'gyur lags so// des/

gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa/ bu mo gang ga tshi rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig/ des dus gzhan zhage na rung re rnamtshan dang ldan par gyur nas } des ri la sbran to/ de
nas khyim bdag 'byor pa dang/ de gnyis dga' dad gur spyad pas des sems can dang ldan par gyur to// gang gi rim la sems can zhugs par gyur pa'i kim de khon bzung nas/ khyim bdag 'byor pa'i nor thams
cad dang/ las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba// mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa// mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa//

lagar rang ba/ dang pral ba'i dbyes che da/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhigapatsas so// de btsas nas lhag par khyim bdag 'byor nga'i dgosapa thams cad

dang/ las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// de nyin bdun gsum nyi shu gcug tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas// mnge 'dogs par byed de zhes bya ba nas/ gang pa zhes bya bar gtag

so zhes re'i ming gang re zhes de'i mnge gang po zhes btags so zhes phyaba'i ba gong ma bzhin no// khye'u gang bo ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de/ rtsis 'phya ba'im ma gnyis dang zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/
/ na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de chen por gyur pa de'i tsho tshig dang/ rtsis dang/ grangs dang/ lag rtsis dang/ dbyung ba dang/ gzhug pang/

zla gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing/ brtag pa brgyad po gzhi'i rtags pa dang/ ras brtag pa dang/ rin po che brtag pa dang/ shing brtag pa dang/ glang po che brtag pa dang/ rta brtag pa dang/ gzhon nu brtag pa dang/ gzhon nu/

ma brtag pa la shin tu byang zhing/ brtag pa gzhan yang byed ba dang/ klog pa la mkhas pa dang/ spyod pa gsal bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag 'byor pasa'abyoralen la sogs pa/ bu rnams rims bzhin du khyim thub pa
dang/ de dge chung ma la lcags par chags pas/ 'tshonam yal bar bor to 'jo sgeg lhur len cing 'khod do// de nas khyim bdag 'byor pa lag pas 'gram pa gtad nas sems khos su chud cing 'dug pa de/ bu

rnams se mthong nas drase ra/ ab khyodatsa'i sled du phyag la zhal gtad nas sems khengs su chud cing bzhugs// des smras pa/ budag nga na ji sridegaser 'bumam red pa de srid du khyim ma phub go/ khyed caga'atshonam

al par bor na chungam la lhag par chags bas 'dze skag lhur len cing 'bod de/ nga sha zhes khyim rtswa ngan gyis gang bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar sems khongs su chud par ma 'gyur/ 'byor len rgyas ran pa che'i rgyan thogs
ma phral nas/ shinge ga rna rgyan cig btags te/ bdag gis ji sridi gser 'bum ma grub pa de sridi ru rin po che'i rgyan gdags par mkhya'o zhes dam bcas so// gcig gas na kyi skyegs kyi sne rgyan no//

nyamatha gag gas na zhe nye'i rna rgyan no// de dag ga mang khyer len dang/ 'byor skyob dang/ 'byor dga' zhes gang yin pa de dag nub par gyur nas/ shing gi rna rgyan dang/ rgya skyegs kyi rna rgyan can/ zha nye'i rna rgyan

can zhes bya ba bar mang grags so// ri rnams zeng thogs te rgya mtsho chen por dong ba dang/ gang pos smras pa// ab bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen chen por mchi'o// des smras ra/ bu khyod bus pa yin gyis 'di

nyid tu 'dug la/ tshong khang gtse ba dag byos shig ces de ni de nyid du 'dug go/ de rnams kyi kyang gru bo che grub nas lha sa te/ lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas smras pa// ab bdag cag gi zanga' da brtsil
gsol/ brtsis nas re res kyang gser 'bur 'bum red par gyur to// gang pos kyang de dedu chos dang mthun par bsgyur ba gser 'bum lhag ge ra nas/ gang pos kyang pa'i rkang pa gnyis lagatugs
nas smras pa/ ab ngo dag gi tshong khang nas bsgyur ba'i rdzas kyang 'tshare gsol des smras pa/ bu khyod 'di shor 'dug 'ojugan/ khyod la bu zhige brtsir med/ res smras pa/ ab 'on kyang brtsi'i
gsol/ mkhyen par 'gyur ro// brtsis nasaṃ gang de yang rags pas bsgrubs pa bzhi pa nyid ma gtogs pa/ gser 'bum lhag cig byung ngo// khyim bdag 'byor pa dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
te bsams pa/ sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig lta ste/ 'dase 'di nyid na 'dug bzhi dugaser 'bum rten cig grub bo snyam m// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/
lcame bdag 'byoras nad kyis btab par gyur nas/ des bsams pa/ bdagashab dang 'di dge bar 'gyur gyis/ thabs shagabasham par bya'o snyam nos/ das de dag la
smras pa/ bu dgashang skam po dag sta gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis shing dag sta gon byas pa dang/ des smras pa// ma bus si/ de rnams kyis me bus pa dang/ des smras pa/ mgam pa re res
phyung zhige/ de rnams kyis 'gal pa de ni nas phyung ba dang/ me desha bar gyur to// des smras pa/ bu dag khyed kyis mthong nam/ yab mthong lags so// des tshigs su bcad pa dag snas ra/ 'gal
pa rtogs pas me 'bar ltar// spun tshogs pa yang de bzhi'o// mgal ma phralanashi 'gyur ba// ma rnams kyang na de dang 'dra/ bu dag nga shi nas khyed cag gas bud med kyi ga mnyan por ma bya'o//
bdu med kyas na mdza' dga' byed/ sngar ma rnams ni ngeg gis 'byed// sa la smras pas gsang tshig 'phel// 'dod pa yis ni mdza' bshes byed// de dag gzhan dong ngo// 'byor lan de nyidan 'dug pa

[% ]dang/ des de la smras pa/ bu khyod kyis ji ltar gyur kyang gang pa gtang bar mi bya ste/ sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa in no zhes bsko ste/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zang nge/ mthon
po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur// phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste// gson pa'i mtha' na'achib yin// zhes smras nas/ dusakyi chos dang ldan par gyur to// de rnams kyis ras sngon pa dang/ ser po dang/

00/ dmar ba dang/ dkar po rnams kyis khyogs rgyan te/ bkur stacher byas nas dur khrod zer du khyer te bsregs so// de nas mya ngan gsang ba byas nas smras pa/ gang gi tshabadag ga pha gson pa de'i tshon sreg de la rag
las na/ da de dus las 'das na gal te ra 'tshonam al bar bor te 'dug na khyim zhig par 'gyur zhing/ nye du rnams kyis dpyas par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag zong thogs te yul gzhan du dong ngo/

gang pas smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag kyang mchi'o// du rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod 'di nyid du 'dug patshong khang gi bya ba dag byos// kho bo cag kho na 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis zong khyer ul gzhan du
dong ngo// 'dul ba ga///dam botishubazhi pa// gang ba la nadi gos ba thams can ga tar nas de nyid gnas so// chos nyid kyis phyug
pa khyim dag na nyin re zhing 'god pa 'gog pa mni pas/ de dag gi chung mas ban me dag mngags te 'god pa nod du btang ba las/ gang pa tshong pa dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon dang/ gzhan yang rjes

su'atsho pa dag gas yongs su bskor zhing 'dug ste/ de dag gis skabs ma rnyed do// jatshem na de dag langs te dong bar gyur pa de'i tsho/ de dag la nyin bar gyi 'gor pa phog go/ bu mo de dag rang zhi la tu 'ongs

pa dang/ kye ma bu mo khyed cag rang zhig mthogs zhes spyod pa las/ de dag gis smras pa// gang pa tshong ba dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon dang/ gzhan yang rjes su 'tshob dag gis yongs su bskor zhing ti/
ma'i 'od gzer lta bur gzi brjid khor zhing bzhugs te/ gang gi tsho de dag langs te mchis pa de'i thog go/ de dag gis smras pa/ gang dag ga khyim na sngon mo'i bu dag/dbang phyug la

dbang byed pa de dag la yang yang de ltar 'gyur ro// 'byor len gyi chung mas sran ma la smras pa/ rang ma lo chu mi'i phyir thogs/ des skabs de rgyas bar smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ khyoda'or che'o// khyod kyis nus shes

zla pa'i phyos la gang zhig de dus shes par byas nas song ba dang myur du thob bo// gzhan dag ni ring du rtogs par gyur nas// de dag gses de la dris pa/ khyod nitsi ni myur bar 'khor/ de thams cad smras nas/ ded
kyang de dang lhan cig 'dor bar brtsamasas// gang pa yang tshong pa dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon dang/ gzhan yang rjes su 'tshob rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa las/ de dag kyang dong nas/

des de la nyin bar gyi god pa phog go/ de dag gas kyang myur du thob bo// de dag gi ngo me dag gis smras pa// d myur du 'khor ba 'di lo rgyus yod/ da dag gas smras pa/ ngom thu mo snyan ma mnga' bar gyur/

gi/ gang gi tshe de'i bran ma mchis pa da' tsho leg lags kyis/ bdag cag de dang 'grogs ta mchi'o// de dag mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa// gang dgagi khyim nā bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la nabang byed

ba de dag la song yang de ltar 'gyur ro// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na'abyoralen dang/ 'byor skyob dang/ 'byor dga' rnams lhan cig tu dga' zhing mthun pas rgya mtsho chen po nas gru bo cher grub ste 'os so//
'khyer len gyis chung ma la dris pa// bzang mo gang pos khyod legs par bskyangs sam/ das smas ba/ ji ltar mang ba'am/ bus bgyi ba bzhi du legs par bgyis go gzhan dag la khyim thab dag gis/

smras pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur lags so// de dag gas bsams pa/ bun med dag ni mdza' shes kyi dbyen

du 'gyur ro snyam mo// ja tsem dus gzhan zhigen ka shi ka'ares kyi tshong khang gi sgo phyi ma thag tu 'byor len rgya bu 'ongs nas/ gang pos de la ka shi ko'ares lug chage bskon no mnar ma dag gis mthong nas
smras pa/ bu 'ad sus byano/ des smras pa/ lu gus byin no// gzhan dag gis mthong nas kyang rang rang gi bu btang ba dang/ kan ka'i res kyi tshong khang gi sgo 'bacad/ ras sbom po dag med pa'i tshong
khang gi sgo phyi bal de dag kyang skyes te phyin nas/ de dag lagang pas ras sbom po dag bskon no// de dag gis mthong nas khyim thab dag la smras pa/ khyed cag gis gzigs sam/ kha i la na ke shika'
ras mug stsal la/ kha cage la ni res sbom po dag go/ de dag gas lan btab pa/ cig gdon mi za bar bdu ltar kag ka'i tshong khang gi ras kyi sgo ni becad la/ ras sgom pa'i skye phyi ba la bab pa zhig
ma mni grang/ de dag gis smras pa/ da dung yang brtag par bgyi'o/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhige nag kha ra'i tshong khang gi sgo phye ba na 'byor len gyi ru 'ongs nas/ des na ka ra'i por bu gang thob ste/
des de khyer nas khyim du song ba dang/ mna' ma dgags mthong nas smras pa/ bu 'di sus byin/ des smras pa// khugs byan no// de dag gis kyang rang rang gi bu btang ba dang/

sha ka ra'i tshong khang ga skon bcad/ bu ram gyi tshong khang gi sgo phye ba dang/ de dag kyang skyes te bu ram gyi tshong khang gi sgo phye ba'i khar 'ongs nas/ de dag gas bu ram zhig thob bo// de dag gis smras
pa/ khyed kyi gzigs sam/ gage la ni na khar stsalal/ gzhan la na bu ram stsal la// de dag gis ni mthong ste/ ji ltar khyome bgo ba byed par syel ba de lta de ltar khyim thab dag bya nas de dag phan
tshun gros byas pa/ bdag cag ga khyame gtan zhig gis bgo bar bya'o// gcig gis smras pa/ phu bo chen po spyan pa snyam/ gcig gis smras pa/ re zhig ji ltar bgo bar spyad de// re gnyis kyis rang gi blos

dpyad pa// gcig gsan khyim n yod pa dang zhing na yod pa'o// gcig gis ni tshong khangan med pa dang yul gzhan n yod pa'o// gcig gas na gang pa'o// gal te phubo chen ras khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pa

nynyo blangs na/ bdag cag gas tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan na med pas red 'tsho bar nus so// 'on te tshong khang na yod pa rang yulugazhanan mar pa blangs na/'on kyang bdag cag gi khyim n med pa dang zhing na yod

ra sa rang 'tsho bar bya zhing/ gang po yang mnar bar nus so snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis de ltar thos bcags te/ 'byor len bya rung ru song nas spyan zhage par 'gyur gyis/bdag cag khyim bage'o// des smras pa//
khyam ga par byed pa ni bud med dag in pas legs pa ra brtags te byab snyam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa// bdag cag gis brtag gas zin gyis bgego/ des smras pa/gal te de lta na gzupe mi lnga zhig bos

shig/ dganyis kyis smras pa// bdag cag gis snga mo zhig tu bag zane na/ gakhrubo me ltaci dgos kyis/ gage gas ni khyim na yod pa dang zhing na med pa dag go/ gcigeg gis tshong khang na yod pa dang yul
gyi mtha' na med pa'o// gcig gsan gang po'o// des smras pa/ mi gang la la skal ba ma spyananag/ de gnyis se smras pa/ bran mo'i bu de la bgo skal sus sbyin/ des ma snyoms kyi de nyid bdag cag bas
bgo'o// gal te khyer bzhed na khyod nyid rtsoms shig/ des bsams pa/ pha nar bdag khyed kyis btog pa thams cad yongs su btang yang gong pa gtang bar ma bya'o zhes bsgo bas/ gang po blang bar bya'o//

snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na gang pa ni kho bos bkur ro// khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pa dpang ba gang yin pa de na rengs par khyim du song nas smras pa/ mna' ma thu me byung zhing/

de phyir byung ba dang/ slar yang ma 'jug cuge/ ci'i phyir bdag cag gis khyim du gtogs pa bgos zin te// tshod khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan n yodapa dbang bgang ba gang dag de yang ra ma thag tu tshong khang
du song nas smras pa/ gang pa mar babs shige/ des babs pa dang/ da phan chad ma 'dzeg cig// ci'i phyir/ bdag cag gas khyim bgos te/ ul gzhan n yod pa dang tshong khang na yod pa ni bo dgag ni
no nades smras pa/ bdag gas ba sgo skal phyinemagi/ des smras pa/ khyod bran mo'i bu azhin khyod la ci'i phyir bgo skal sbyin/ der ma zad khyod nyid kho bo cag gis bgos te/ phu

ba chen pos thob bo// 'byor len gyi chung mgang po dang lhan cig 'grogs te gzhan zhig gi khyim du dong ba na/ bus pa bkres nas nga bar brtsams so// des smras pa/ gang po bus pa dag la ga mar lus stsol
cig }des smras pa/ kar sha pa ṇa phog cig/ des smras pa/ khyed kyis gser 'bum red kyis spobs byas na/bus padag gis dbyar sus mamasapa lta/ ma kho bos khyam 'di 'dra ba khos su 'debs
bar 'gyur bar shes sam/ gal te kho bos shes par gyur na/ gser 'bum phrag du ma spags la zhuge/ bud med kyi gos kyi mthar ma sha ka snum can dag thum bod pa de na chos nyid yin te/ des ma

ma can zhig thog ste g.yaragus snyoms te spyon cig/ des de khyer te tshong dus su song ba las/ ma zhigargya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bdasa'i shing los khur zhig khyar ta/ grong bas sbrebs nas 'dar zhing 'ong ba do/

tstshā dis mthong nas dras pa/ kyi nang rje ci'i phyir da ltar dar/ des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang ma 'tshal te/ cung zad don khur 'di thogasanas bdag de 'dra bar grong gyur to// de shing brtag pa la mkhas pas sa

shange de brtag par bsams pa dang/ den tsan dan sa mchog med par mthong nas/ des de la smras pa kyi nang rje rin jitsam du btsong ]kangasha pa ṇalnga brgyar ro// des shange khur de blangs nasatsan dan sa mchog

de phyung ste/ tshong dus su seng nas sog les dum bu bzhir gshags te/ bur ma de rnams kar shapa skya stong du btsongasas/ de nas de la ka lan pa lnga brgya byin te 'ad skad ces smras so// khyim ga ge ma zhes bya/

ban 'byor len gyi chung ma 'dug gis/ dar shing khur 'ad phyir la gang pos bskur pa yin no zhes byos shig/ des de khyer nas ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang/ des brang brdungs nas smras pa/'di ltar de nor mkhyan/

na shes rab kyang 'khyams bsam/ ci bco ba 'tshol du btang na btsosgyu gang yin pa de nyid med par bud pa bskur ro// nga rtsom gzhan zhig na grong khyer slom lta bu'i rgyal po tshaba'i rimes chen pos thebs nas/ myog myog

por gyur pa de la sman ra sa tsan dan sa mchog bstan to// de nas blon po rnams kyis tsan dan sa mchog btsal bar 'tshams pa dang/ de rnams kyis tshong dus su brgyud pa las thos nas/ de rnams gong pa'i drung du

sang sta tsan danas mchog med dam/ yod do// ni ja tsam du bcong/ kar sha pa ṇa stong ngo// de rnams kyis kar sha pa ṇastong gis nyos nas/ rgyal po la phyug pa dang sos par gyur to// rgyal pos b.las pa/ gang gi

khyim na tsan danas mchog med pa rgyal pod ca de dra pa zhig ga ani snyam nas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la skyas pa/ 'ad ga las 'ongs/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gang ma las so// gang pa 'di'i khug
ga der pho rta song nas smras pa/ gang pa lhas bka' stsal to// des dpyad par brtsams pa/ rgyal po bdag yaci'i phyir bka' stsal/ des zhing bsams pa/ de tsan dan sa mchog gsasnyan gadangs par
'gyur pas/ pa'i phye'i bdag la bka' stsal gyis/ tsan dan sa mchog thams cad khyer te 'gro'o snyam nas/ des tsan dan sa mchog gnyem bu gsum ras kyi nang du dgras te/ gathig lag tu
rdzogs nas rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang/ rgyal pos smas pa/ gang po tsan dan sa mchog cung zad yod dam/ des smras kha/ lha 'dir mchis so// bdal ran dza tshon/ gser 'bum mo// gzhan yod dam/ lha
mches so zhes/ des dum bu gsum char pa stan pa dang/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ gang po la gser bzhu 'bumatsane ge gang bas smras pa/ lha gsum rgyanostsol ge gcig ga ni ske la skyes su

'tsho'abul lo// gsum gyi byon nas/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gang po khyod nga'i thugs su 'thad rgyas/ mchog 'dod pa gsolagacige dang sbyin no// lhagal te zugs dpa' thad par gyur na/ lha'i tshul du sus kyang mgatso

gar mas par gsol/ rgyal bos blon po rnams la bsgopa/ shesaldan dag dang phyin chad khyed kyis gzhon du rnams la bsgo bar bya'o// gang po la ni ma yin no// tsam na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho chen po'i chu cher
pa grub nas/ grong khyer slom lta bur lhags so// tshong pa'i tshogs kyis nang khrims su bcas pa/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig r tshogs las gar te tshong pa'i drung dul bar ma bye'o// gal te gang de la

karapag pa ṇa drug tu dbab bo// khrungs kyang tshogs 'dus te blang bar bya'o zhes bcas so// kha cig gas smras pa/gang pa yang skrun pa snyam/ kha cig gse smras pa/ bkon pa dal spra da/ de'i tshog ng pa phyi

phyung bzha/ sa tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtshon na bo nas gru bo cher grub nas/ grong khyer glo ma lta bur phyin to zhes thos nas de grong khyer du ma zhugs pa nyid du de dag gi drung du song ste sa pa/ shes ldan dag rdzas 'di dag ni
an/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di de nga 'ang reg an no// zhi ṇatsem/ dad pen gar phyin ang khyed kho na dri bar bsas// des smras pa/ gal te de yin yang 'on kyang rin thang smosashagi/ de dag gis
gseras a rung brgyad 'bumadu rane btab bo// des smras pa// shes ldan dag thag bcad pa'i gser sum 'bum khye ge/ khong 'ditegan kho ba'i yan no// lhag man nang du phyin nas sbyin no// de

bzhin du bgyi'o zhes pa dang/ des gserasum 'bum yong blangs nas zag bcad pa'i phyire byin/ rang gi rgyas kyang btab ste song ngo// de nas tshopa'i tshogs kyis tshong pa'i ga mog ga ma reg rdzas ci yod
ltos shage ces mngags nas/ de dag song snyadris pa/ rdzas 'dareg rtsa dazhi/ 'di teng yod deg yin no// bdag cag la 'di 'dra bas zhi mdzod dang bar bgang bar 'dug go/ de rnams kyis smras pa//
gang yang rung mgong yang du bste/ 'on kyang 'ad btsos zin to// su zhigel/ gang po 'go/ gang po la btsongasazhachen mo zhig khugs med/ da rnams kyis smras pa/ des zag bcad par byin pa
gang yin pa de khyed kyis rin du yang mi sbyin no// des zag bcad par du byon/ gser sum 'bum mo// des phu bo de dag las bzhus yang dag go/ de rnas slar log ste tshong pa'i tshogs la smras pa// rdzasad
shug/ dag na btsongs zin to// u zhagi la/ gang ba la gang pa btsongasan chen mo 'gi khugs mod/ das thag bcad par byin pa gang yin pa de khyed kyis ni du zhang min no// des zag

bcad nga ra ru byin/ gse ra sum 'bum mo// des spyan de dag la brkus yang dag go/ de rnams kyis rebs nas smras pa/ gang de tshong ba'i tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa sus kyang gage dug zong mthong gi tshong

pa'i tshogs kho na blang bar bya'o zhes bcas nas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyi'i blang/ des smras pa/ shes ldan rig gang gi tsho khyad kyi khrims su bca' ba byas pa de'i tsho kholo'am/ kho bo'i phu nu dag la zasgo 'am/ khyer kho

nas khrims su bca' ba byas/ khyed cag nyid srungs shig/ de nas tshong pa'i tshogs khros nas kar sha pa ṇadrug cu'i phyir bzung ste/ zhim la bzhag pargyal po'i mi kheng gse mthong ba de dag gsargyal la spusal/

rgyal pos bsgo ba shes ldan dag de rnams khug ruge/ de dag gis de rnams bkug pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa ldan dag khyed cag gis ci'i phyir gang ba bzung ste nyi ma la bzhag// lha tshong pa rnams kyis khrims

su bcas pa sus kyang gcige pus thong 'jal tshong ma bgyi'o zhes bcas pa las/ 'di gcig pus 'jal tshong bgyis pas so// des/sa pa/ lha gang gi tshe 'di dag gis khrims su bca' ba bgyis pa dang tsho' na deg
gi ni bdag gam/ bdag ga du nu bo dag la bsgo 'am zhes rmar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang pa'i shags bzang ngo// de rnams skyes nas btang ngo// tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po la

rdzabashig ga degos pa byung bas/ des tshong pa'i tshogs pa kug ste bsgo ba/ shesaldan dag pal rdzas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig dgos kyis/de nga la phul cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gang bo la mchis so//

des smras pa// ngal bka'am stsal gyis/ khyed nyid kyis de chos la nga la phul cig/ de dag gses gang po la pho nya btang ste/ rmong pa'i tshogs 'bod do zhus byas so// des smras pa/ kho bo mi 'ong ngo// des

tshong pa'i tshog thams cad 'dusate/ de'i khyie du song nas sger bsdad de da la 'phrin pabatang nas/ gang pa tshong pa'i tshogs sgen sded kyis byung zhig cis spang ngo// dang rgyal dang nyam bu shes dang bcas pa'i

dregs pas byung ba dang/ chong pa'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ dad dpon ji ltar nyes pa bzhin du thong byin cig/ des smras pa/ gal te ji ltar chos pa bzhin 'od byin na kho bo tshong pa chen po yin mod/ de dag gis smras pa/
rin nyis 'gyur gyis byani gi dang/ tshong par tshogs mchod par 'gyur ro// des bsams pa/ rmong pa'i tshogs mchod par bya ba yin no snyam nas des s u dang lnga 'bumaran nyis 'gyur du byin no// lhag

ma na khyim du smras nas des basams pa/ ji ga zil pa'i thogs pas bum pa dgang bar nus sam rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/des grong khyer slo ma ltakhur

dril sgrogs su bcug nga/ shes ldan grong khyer blo ma ltabu na gnas pa'i tshong pa dag nyon 'ge gdod po gang rgya mtsho chen por 'jugasar 'gyur gyis khyed cag las gang zag ded dpon gang po dang lhan thag shog m med pa dang/

ku// la gcan pa'i gru med pa dang/ gru btsas med par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par spro ba de dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byos shag tshong ba lngabargya tsam gyis rgya mtsho chen pora'adong

zong sta gon byas so// de nas ded dpon gang po dge mtshan dang/ bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las/ gru bo ma grub nas grong khyer so ma lta bur 'khor

ro// de lta bur lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las/ gru bo cher grub nas slaro// phyogs kun tu gang pos lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las/ gru bor grub nas slar 'khor ro zhes
sgra grags pa dang/ mnyan yod pas tshong pa dag zong thogs te/ grong khyer blo ma lta bur 'dong nas/ de dag lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ ded dpon gang po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas smras pa/

ded dpon rgya mtsho chen por bzhud do// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag lan drug gibar du rgya mtsho chen po nas grub tshar grub ste/ sngar 'khor ba las bdun par 'jug pa khyed cag gis mthong ba 'am/ thos pa
'ga' yod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ gang po bdag cag shul rang pos khyod kyi ched du lhags te/ gal te ma 'jugan khyod nyid tshad mnan// des bsams pa/bdag lan nor gyis cung zad kyang

ma chog pa med na/ 'di deg gi don du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de de rnams dang lhan cig tu rgya mtsho chen por chas so// de dag gsanam tharangs kyi dus su ched du brjod pa dang/ pha rol 'gro byed dang/ bden pa mthong ba dang
gnas brtan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ gnas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ thub pa tshigs su bcar dang/ don gyi tsho mas lamado dag gsang bstod de bton/
pa dang/ des de dag thos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gru bzang po zhig gas long zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ des de dgan ma lags so// 'onaden rebangs rgyas kyi bka' go/ des sangs rgyas zhes

bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sku zang zhes byed nas gus pa dang bcas pa dris pa/ shos ldan dag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig yin/ des rnams kyis skyes ba/

shākya'i sras dge sbyong go'u tam shākya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos dur snyag bgos te/ dad pa kho nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byun gnas de blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba zhig yod de/ ded dpon den sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'o// shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang na bzhugs/ded dbon mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyur/

byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// des de gang la bzung nas de rnams dang lhan tsag rgya mtsho chen po zhugs te gru botshor grub nas slar lhags so// de'i bu bo'abyor len gyis bsam/

pa 'di rgya mtsho chen por 'gro 'gro bas dub par gyur gyis/'di khyim dbub par bya'o snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ khyod kyi don du tshong pa dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon gang gi bu mo blang ba thu bo la smos
shig des smras pa/ bdag 'dod pa mi 'tshalagyi/ ga2te gnang nab tu byung ngo// des snas pa/ gang gi tshe bdag cag khyim gyi 'tshonam lam zhugs pa de'i tshe/
chu mi 'byung bar/ domi'i phyir rab tu 'khyud/ des smras pa/ de'i tshon ma'ogs lags s// dmigasalags so// des degadon mi za' 'gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ro// des smras pa//
'u bo rgya mtsho chen po nanyes dmigs nim la/ mnogane chung do// der 'jug ba nemadal/ slar 'khor ba ne'ung bas/ khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mkhyago/ khyod
la rigs pas bsgrubs pa'i nor phal mo che yod la } khyod kyi nu bo dag la rigs pa ma yin pas bsgrubs pa yin pas/ gal te de dag na re lhan cig 'khod par bya'o zhes zeran/ 'jug par mi bzhes

sna dag/ rimagro po gcig khrid de mnyan yod du sad ste/ mnyan yod kyi skye'amos tshal pu'adu gnas / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'phrin pa btang ste/ khyim bdag ded dpon gang po phyim bdag lta bar

nas skyed mos tshal na sdodado zhes sīdab dang/ mgonamedatras sbyin gyis bsams// gdonamiza bar chu'i bzhon bas dub nas/ da ni thang gi bzhon pas 'ongos so snyam mo// de nas sa ba/ kyenang rje zong ji snyed cig/
khyer te 'ongs/ pal 'ong ga la yod rim gro pa dang gnyis pu ste/ dadadabadag tu bas sa// mgoname dawas sbyin gyis bsams pa/ gang ga gis skyes bu dam pa del bkur sti ma byas bar khyim du bod pa ni

[o]ba dag rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam nas/des dbakur ste chen pos khyim du bos nas bsku mnyes te khrus byas nas/zan byin te dga' ba'i gtam byas te 'dug nas/mgonamed zas sbyin gyis dris pa/ dod spyi
bon dgos pa ci zhig la 'os/khyim bgabadag ni legs par gsungs ba'i sa 'dul ba la ma zhu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'al lo//de nas khyim bdagamagonamedabras/
sbyin gyis ro stod nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched brjodobs ched brjod// kye ma'o sa sa rgyag kye'o chog kye ma'oge 'dun/kyem chos legapar gsus banyidadalani/dgyes bugatsobo 'di lta bu

a rang gi skye bo dang/ gnyen bshes kyi tshog rgya chen po pad mdzod dang dbang ba dang/ mdzod byas pa rnams kyang spangs nas/ leg par gsus pa'i chos 'dulab rang 'byung zhing bsnyenabar rdzogs pa dge slong/

dngos po 'dod bcu gyur to// de nas khyim khadag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ded dpon gang bo khrid de 1bcom ldan 'as gang ba so do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgyaphrag dusu'i gungal zhugā nas
chos 'chad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin skyes dang sa te rtod ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim bdag mgonamedabs spyi

skyes dang chas te de ltar 'ong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di lta bu ide/ 'di lta ste/ 'bul ba'i skyes 'go/ den khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/khacom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs gnyis mgo bos phyag
byas te/ded dpon gangapo dang lhan cig phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim b dag 'gon medazas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa ded dpon gang po 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi ngos po'atshalan/ debcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen pa
rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'os kyis khyim bdag mgon med thos spyin cang ma gsung bos gnang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ded dpon gang po la bka' stsal ba/ ge slong tshurag

tshangs par spyad ba snyed cig gces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nas de skra byib dang/ snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ skra dang spyi zhag bdun skyes btsam dang/ lag na lhung bzed dang/ byamakhum/
thogs pa dang/ dge slongabasnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyurato// de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog gsungs sado//sā byin stsam gyuragyon pa'i lus ldan zhing/ mdal

dbang po rab zhis gnas gyur to/ sangs rgyas dgos pas lus gzugru bkab par gyur// de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa gang pakhom ldama'adas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 28sa kyi zhashā
ṇṇaṃ gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
las bdag gis ma dor bsdus pa'i chos thos pa ji lta bu s gcig pu dben pa bag yod bdad rtul ba dang ldan la/ bdag nyid gtod cing gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad sgyu

du gsol/ gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa dang rkun pa dang ldan l/ bdaganying la gtod ceng gnas na rigs kyi du dag gang gi phyi'i skra dang kha spu bregs nas gas dur sīg bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas

khyim nas khyim mam chis par rab tu 'byung bar bgyid pa tsha a par spyod pa'i mtha'akhranam mchis pa de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te basprubā nas// bdag giskye ba ni/
zad do// tshangs par spyod pa ni gad do// bya ba ni byas yod srid pa dilas gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar bgyid pa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa gang po 'di//

ces bka' stsal to/ gang ba 'gro sa legs so//gang po gapa khyed 'di skad du srid pa 'a de las gzhan mi shes zhes bya banas delta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legrwa ba bshad dugasal zhes bya ba'i bar sgrub ni

yang legs zhes bya ba sa ma bzhin te/ de'i phyir rab tu nyon la yidelazung zhig dang bshad do// gang po mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzug sdug po dang/ chags pa dang/ dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba dang 'tsho/

kha dang ldan pa dang/ kun tu chag par 'gyur ba yodal/de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nasa mngon par dga' ba dang/ mngon par bstod pa dang/ lhag par chags pa dang/ lhagapar zhen cing gnas na dad ga la
mngon par dga' ba dang/ mngon par ston pa dang/ lhag par chags pa dang/ lhag par zhen cing gnas pa de la kun tu dgarab 'byung ngo// kun tu dga' ba yod na dga' ba dang yid

bdebar 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang yid bde ba yong na kun tu chags par 'gyur ro// kun tu chags pa yod na kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur te/ dga' ba dang/ kun tu chags pa dang/ kun tu sbyorab dang ldan par gyur pa'i

dge slong ni gang po mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o// gang po rna bu rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang/ snasaṃ rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang/ lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang/

lus rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rung/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang/ chags pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang/ kun tu chags par 'gyurapa rnam

yod la/ de dag gal te dag slong gis mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma yin no// gang po mig gis rnam par shes par byab gzug sdug pa

dar chagrwa pa rang/ dga' kha dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang/ kun tu chag par 'gyur ba yod la/ de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nas 'don par ma dga' ba dang mngon par mi stor pa dang/
lhag par ma chags pa dang/ lhag par mi zhen cing gnas na/ de dag la mngon par mi ga' ba dang/ mngon par mi bstod pa dang/ lhag par a tshogs pa dang/ lhag par ma zhen par gnas pa de la kun tu dga'/

ba mi 'byung ngo// kun tu dga' ba med na dga' ba dang yid bde ba mad par 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang yid bde ba med na kun tu m chakasapar 'gyur ro// kun tu chags pa med na kun tu sbyor ba mad par 'gyur ro//

kun tu sbyor ba ne pa ni dga' ba dang/ kun tu chags pa dang/ kun tu sbyor ba dang mi ldan pa'i dag slong ni/ gang po mya ngan las 'das pa la tabar gyur pa zhes bya'o// gang pornalas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang/

sbas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang/ lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i do dang/ lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang/ yidekyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang/ chags pa dang/
dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang/ kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod la/ de dag gal te dge slong dag gis mthong nas zhes bya ba dang/ de ni myongan las 'das pa la taṭar
gyur pa zhes bya ba'i 'ar 'ong mabazhin du'o// gang po ngas mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis khyod la gtugs na gang du gnas par 'dod/ gang du gnas 'atsa' bar 'dod// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
sangor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis bdag gtams lags pas/ 'gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul mthar mchis par 'tshal lags so// gang po bro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi ma thalami rnams ni gtum pa/

gzu lums can/ rtsu ba pa/ gshe ba/ sngo thungab/ 'phya ba yin te/ gang po gal te khyod la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams mngon sum dusdig pa tshogs par mi rabyung ba'i tshig rtsu ba pos gshe bar
byed༔ zher 'debs par byed/ 'phya bar byed na/ de lakhyod ji snyam du byed// btsun pa gal te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams bdag la mngon sum dusdigapa tshogs par m byung ba'i
tshig rtsub pos gshepar bgyide/ zher 'deyas pas bad da 'phyakhan bgyid na/ de la bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ ema'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i tha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no// sa 'ogrol len

skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams zhi blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag la sdig patshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub posag she bar byed/ zhor 'debs par byed/ 'phya bar byed kyang lag pa 'am/ bong bas ma

brgyab snyam tsho// gang pogro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gzhug pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'phya bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhinate/ gang po gal te gro bzhinaskyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis

dbyag pa 'am/ mtshonagyis brgyab na/ de la khyodadzisnyam byed/ btsun pa gal te bdag la glo bzhin sa gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis phyugapa 'am/ mtshon gyis brgyab par gyur na/ de la bdag gis 'di snyam du
sems te/ kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba yazheno// kye ma'ogro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag la byug pa'i m/ mtshon gyis

brgyab kyang/ thamasacad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar mi byed do snyam mo// gang po gro bzhin gyis gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams gtum pa zhes byab nas/ 'bya bar byed pa yin nozhes bya ba'i bar du ste//

00gal tagang po gro bzhinestsam gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis/ khyod thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar byed na/ de la khyod ji snyam byed/ btsun pa gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams
kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar bgyiden/ de la bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te } bcom ldan 'das kyi gnatses lus rnag can 'dis skyo ba dang/ ngo tshab dang/ rnam
par spyod pa gang drag mtshon gyis kyang 'debs par byed/ dug kyang bra bar byed/ thag pas kyang 'gegs te 'chi bar byed/ galangs nas kyang mchongs te 'chi'i yongan/ kye ma'o kro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i

mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no// kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/ dngag bdag gi lus rnag can 'di las tshegs chung ngus grol bar byed do snyam bsam par bgyi'o/

gang po legs so legs so// gang po khyod bgrod pa dang des pa 'di dang ldan par/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar gnas par nus pa na khyod yang legs so// gang po song la ma bsal ba rnams ni sgrol cig/

ma sgrol pa rnams ni khrol cig/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams na rebyags phyang zhig/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung

pa mngon par bstod cing rjes su ya res nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhalasaṃganyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snga nas song ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pagang po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas } snga
[z ]// dro sham khrab sabagos te/ lhung bzedadang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi bras kyi bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms
las slar log ste/ gnas mal ji ltar 'atsongs dpamakhos su phab nas lhung bzed dang/ chos kos thogs te/ grobazhines gnas pa'i yul gyi mtha' gang na ba derams de rim gyis rgyu zhing songal na/ go

bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar phyin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po snga dro sham thabs bkos/ lhung 'bred dang chos gos thogs te/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mthar bsod snyoms lo zhugs pa/ rngon pa

sbya ]zhig mda' gzhu lag tu thogs te 1 ri dgas 'chor du 'gro ba des mthong nas/ des khasams la/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'di mthong ba ni rje ma rung bar byas so snyam bsams nas/ gnurna drung bkang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang

kho gang na ba der rgyugasapa dang/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos re mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bla kos sīl tesas pa/ bzhin 'khrungs dgang dka'akha 'di'i don du zhugs pas 'di la snyan cig/ tshigasu khacad de yang

sa pa/ gang gi don du mkha' la bya rgyur degs rtis brin gyur// g.yul ngor mda' mdung mda'atho'i thogs mi rnams matsho'agyur la// bkren bton mongs yul ngan rgyu zhing mchil pas na brin pa/ sdige la rab

mang lto 'dir khyod kyis tsham rings mda' 'phongs shig/ des 'asams pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dini 'di ltabu'i bzod pa dang/ des pa dang ldan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di mda' 'phang snyam du bsamasanas/ de sems mngon

par dad par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de la chos bshad de skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bzhag pa dang/ des ri zod der gzhon lnga brgya'i rige 'asnyan du byas/ lngakhargyan dge bsnyen par byas/

nas gtsug lag khang lnga brgya ba rtsig tu bcug ste/ khri dang/ khri'u dang/ stan nang tshangs can dang/ sngasanang tshangs can dang/ goraṭhalas 'argya phrag du ma 'dzul du bcug go/ klu ba gsum po de 'das pa dang/ des rig pa gzhung

lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas 'grakhacog par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas/ dbang po dang nye rab ng po'i lha dang rus pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang/ brjed par bya ba dar/

mngon sum du sa ba bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// rdzi tsam dus gzhan zhig na shing gyi rnam can gyin kho gnyis longs spyod bsrabs share yongs su brad lagacugs par gyur nas/ de gas kyis slas pa/ byur lta'u
de bdag la khyims song gis/ tshur shog lhan cig gnas par bya'o// des sas pa/ byur lta bure gang zhig yin/ gang po yin mod/ de ni kho bo'i khyim nas dpal byung ba yin gyi/ debyur lta bu zhim lanano//
de gnyis kyis sbas pa/ dpal yang rung/ byur yang rung/ tshur shog/ lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o// des smras pa/ khyed cag gi nor ni rigs par bslabs pa ma yin l/ kho bos ni rigs par basams pa ya'i

pas khyed cag dang kho bor lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bran mo'i bu des rgya mtsho chen por yang song yang song nas khyod kyi longs skyon dag bsgrubs pas/ khyod re spyad pas rgyags su zado/
khyod kyis ni rgya mtshochen por 'jug par ga la nus/ dadeganyis lasang rgyal bzung nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'osnyam nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgya mtsho chen

por zhugs sozhes bya ba'i bar gong mas bzhin du'o// ji tsam na grukho che de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal du 'das so// sa mkhan gyi se sus pa/ shes ldan dag tsan dan sa mchog gi tshil zhes gragab gang zhe

pa re ni 'di yin gyis/ 'di las gdoms la long zhig/ de'i tshe tsan dan sa mchog gi tshul gyi dbang po gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba yin te/ de yang gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ngo// de nas

tsan danas mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis kacad par brtsams so// gnod sbyin mi dga' ba zhes bya ba'i/ tsan dan sa mchog gitshal stare lnga brgya tsam gyis kod pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin dbang

phyug chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// dpon po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ tsan dan sa mchog gi rgyal sta ze lnga brgya tsam gyis 'gums na/ khyod kyi 'phrin

las sam bgyi ba gang lags pa ro mdzod cig/ de nas gnod sbyin dbang phyugachen po gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun ma byas nas ma 'brod pa skyes to/ rlung nag po chen po 'jigs su rung ra bslang nas/ tsanu lus

mchog gi tshul gang na ba der chas so// sa mkhan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshong pa dganyon cig/ chung nag po chen po 'jiges pa 'jigos pa zhig yong ngo// zhes grag pa gang yin pa de na 'di yin

gyis ngo lon soms shig/ de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams 'jigs skrag phongs te ba khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/ lha rnams la gsol bar byed par rtsom ste/ zhi ba dang ni chu lha lus ngan nor sogs

dang/ lha ma lto 'phye gnod sbyin lha min dbang po rnams// bdag cagashin tu nyam thug 'jigs par gyur lags kyis// bsāṇas bral de ring bdag cag rnams kyi mgon mdzod cig/ mi rnams kyi na kha cig bde sogs

khyod la 'dud// gzhan dag tshangs dang khyab 'jug lha chen dang/ dasar rten shing dang tshal la rten pa la// sha za'i rlung gis zin pas skyabs tshol 'dud// shing gi rna chacan sems las chung ngus 'dug pa dang/ tshong pa rnambha

kyis smras ba/ ded dpon bdag cag nisdug mi 'brad pa nyam nga bar gyuran/ khyod ci'i phyir sems las chur ngur 'dug/ des a la/ shes ldan dag kho bo lanu bos 'asgo ka/ phu'orgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni/

mnog chung la nyes dmigs mang bste/ srod pas ldongs pa phal cher 'jug pa ni slor 'khor ba nyung bas/ khyod kyis rnam pa gang gis kyang rgya mtsho chen po 'jug par khyi'o zhes bsgo ba las/ kho 'os de'i tshig ma mnan te/

rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pas da ci byar yang med do// khyod kyi nu bo gang yin/ gang po yin no// tshong pa'itshogs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'phags pa gad po de ni bsod rnams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa
yin gyis/ de de la bdag cag skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o zhes/ de thams cad kyis tshig mthun par 'di skad ces/ 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo//

[ri/ ]// phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la mngon par dga' ba' lha gang yin pa de dag/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces
za smras so// 'phags pa khyod kyikacenanasdug bsngal mi 'khrud pa nyam nga bar gyur gyis dgos su gsol/ des bsams te/ de de nas sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pa na/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha' nas

tsho mi snang bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rlung nag po der rab la phogaste/ rdzugs pa bzhin du sār log par gyur to// gnod

[6 ]sbyin dbang phyug chen pos bsams pa/ sngon chad ni rlung nag pos gru gang la reg pa de shing bal gyi 'dababu bzhin 'phangs pa dang 'jig par 'gyur na/ da rlung nag po de ra reb la phogaste/ rdzugs pa bzhin du slar log par

gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas na tshun du brtag par brtsams pa las/ jitsam na tshe rang ldan pa gang po gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa mthong ngo// ma thong nas kyang des smras pa/ 'phags pa ka ra

pomatho btsems te ci bgyi/ gang pos sas pa/ rga ba'i chos can kho bo nyare mthos btsam mam/ gal te ngas 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob par gyur na/ khyod kyisanga'i phu bo tshang lus pa'i byas par 'gyur
ro[;]dbang phyug chen pos sbasapa/ 'phags pa tsan danas mchoga'adi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i don du srung lags so// gang posasas pa/ dpon po ji snyam dusems } de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

[z ]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo gang/ 'phags pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jige rten du byung ngam/ byungo// gal te de ltan da gong ma gang re khong zhig de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de

rnams srog byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la sems mngon par dad nas/ gru detsan danas mchog gis bkang ste rgyas pa dang/ rim gyis grong khyer so ma lta bur phyin to// de nas gang pos/ phu bo las pa/ gang ga ming gi gru bo che

gu'i nor grub ste 'ongs pa de ni de rab ng bas/ khyod kyis rin po che ni tshong pa 'di rnams la bgos shig/ bdag gis nang nas mchog 'di las kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi yulnga tsan dan gyi 'phrang khang bzungs brtsig no/

des tshong pa de rnams larin po che rnams 'gos so// de nas gang pos tshan nas mchog gi khang babrangs zhig brtsigepa' 'artsa nams te/ des bzo bo dag bkug nas sus pa/ shes ldan ngag ci nyi ma re re zhin

kar sha ra ta lnga brgya len nam/ 'on te tsan dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang len/ de dag gis smras l/ 'phagasapa tsan dan sa mchog gi phye ma phosum gang 'tshal lo// ji tsaman ring po ma thogs par tsan

dan gyi 'phrang ba'i khang babrangs ba rtsi'i te/ byi dor thams cad zin bar gyur to// de na zhogs ma dang phyi ma'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag kyang btags nas de nyid la zhal zhal du zhugs so/ des sdunare rnams phan tshun
thams cad bzod pa gsol du bcug nas sbas pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drongs la zhal zas gsol cig/ 'phags pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs mnyan
lod na'o// lamaji sridaaches/ mnyan yod du dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam mo// re zhig rgyal po la brtag par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyis shig/ de dag rgyal po'i drung du don gnas / lha bdag
rug sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan dros te/ zhal bras gsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas bangag cag la bstan du gsol/ rung gis de bzhin du bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po khang
steng du 'dzegs nas rgyal byed kyi cha la logs su kha bltas te/ pus mo lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te 'dug nas me tog gis gtor/ bdug pas 'dugs nas/ khyim pa zhig gser gyi bya ma bum 'dzin du
