bcug ste }gsol ba 'debs pa zhugs pa/ tshul khrim rnam dag gnetu rnam ngag blo//zhal zas dus su rtag tungon gabrigs pa// mgon med gyur pa rab tu gaphrogs nas ni/ shin tu thugs brtses mdzad de

gshegs par gsol// de nas me tog de rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i ro thus lo tog gi khang babrangs su byas te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal durgan rims bzhin du gnas par gyur to

bdug pa ni sprin ltar sbyangs so// chum nu'i phur ma lta bur gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas pa yin pas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa spyan 'dren pa gang

bas mchis/ kun dga' kho grong khyer slom lta bu nas so// btsun pa grong khyer so ma lta bur ji srid cig mchis/ kun dga' bo dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam yod kyis 3song la dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang dang gang/ sang grong

khyer so ma lta bur song nas zan bro bar sprub tshul shing song zhig ces sgo zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'adas la mnyan yod nas tshul shing blangs te/ bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar 'jug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshul shange blangs so// de'i tshe yul chu maka can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa gad po// shes rab kyis rnam

pa' grol ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus tre 'dug par gyur pa des kyang tshul share byung bar brtsams pa dang/ de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshigs su bcad de sa pa/ tsho dang ldan pa zan 'di ni// ko sa la bdag/

po'i pho brang ngam// ra' sbyin khyim dang ri dgas kyi// khyim gyi khrus yang ma lags so// grong khyer so ma zhes bya ba// dpag tshad brgya lhag mchis pa der// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bzhud 'tshal bas// gad po khyod
ni ma gsung bzhugs/ de shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin gyis/ des rdzu 'phrul ma bskyod pas de 'di sām du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag gi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dgakhasal zhing 'od la spangs

shinge so sor sangs nā/ bdag mu stegs can dang thun mong ba'i rdzu 'phrul sgyid lug gam snyam nas/ nges brtson 'grus la gnas te rdzu 'phrul bskyod pas/ ji sring tsho rang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan
gsum pa la tshul shing mkhyen pa de'i bar du/ des lagal glang po che'i lta bu brkyang nas tshul shing blangs te/ de nas tshigasasu'icad pas sus pa/ go'u ta ma'adzin mngon shes drug po nyer// grags pa
dang ni thos pas slob min la/ chen gyi yon tan rnams dang ngag dang// yid smon chen pos kyang ni ma yin gyi// bdag 'dra engs su rtog par byed pa rnams// rga bas dar yul gyur kyang
zhi ba dang/ tshul khrims lhag mthong stobs dang bsam gtan stobs// rnam pa du mas mngon shes drug ldan 'gyur// de nas bcom ldanu'adas kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge sbyong 'dān

nga'i dge slong rnams kyi mchog yin te/ nga rkyen thos mchod pa'i tshul shing blang ba la dang po'o// tshulangashing len pa rnams kyi nang na 'dilta ste/ yul chumagacan n gnas pa'i gnas brtan gang po mtshig yin
'kho no de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos nga la dge slong rnams la/ ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba mi snyems pa dang/ sdig pa mi bcug
par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyi/ 'on kyang grong khyer de na mu stegs pa rnams gnas bas khyed las gang gis rdzulaphrul gang thob pa de/ des grong khyer slom lta bur song la zan bza' bar bya'o//
zhes sgo zhige/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dgu bcom ldan 'das kyis
'di skad ces/ ngas dge slong rnams kyis dge ba mi snyoms pa dang/ sdig pa mi bcas par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyi zhes bya ba nas/ ming la zan bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o bor gong ma
bzhin du'o// rgyal bos grong khyer blo ma lta bur rdo ba dang/ gsog ma dang/ rtsom rnams sel du bcug ste/ tsan dan gyi chag rma khag btapa/ dri zhim po'i be ga par sna tshogs bshams/ dar gyi chun

'phyang mang po dpyangs/ ma tog sna tshogs chal par bkram ste/ dga' dga' ltar byas so// grong khyer slom lta bu la sgo bcod brgyad yod la/rgyal bo de la yang bu bcu bdun yod de/ grong khyer gyi sgor rer so

sor rgyal bo'i bu rnam 'byor pa mchog dang bkod do//sgo chen poran slom lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang/ shing ga rna cha can dang/ rgya skyegs rnachacan dang/ zha

te'i rnacha can 'dug go/ jitsaman lo ma 'dim pa dang/ shang tsho'agrim pa dang snod smadu'adril pa dag rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags pa rgyal pos mthong nas sas pa/ke tsun pa gang pa bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/ de
smras pa/'di dag ni la ma 'drim pa dang/ shang tsha'adris pa dang/ snodapyad 'drim pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das mi lags so// jitsan dag slong gnas brten gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs
pa rnam pa du mas lhags pa dang/ rgyal pos yang dris pa/ ci btsun pa gang pa bcom ldan 'dus gshegs sam/ des smras pa/ ma lags te/ 'di dag ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan
la snyoms par zhugs pa/ rnam pa du mas lhags pa la gas so// de nas dge bsnyan zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smyos pa/ khacige seng ge stag dang glang po che rta klu dang khyung mchog bzang po bcibs// ]
khacig rin chen gzhal khong dang ri dang de mdzes shing rta 'bar la brten// gzhan dag nam mkha'i ngos las chu'adzin glog gi 'phreng bas brgyan pa lta bur nā/rab tu dgyes bzhin lu li pho

za thang lta bur rdzu 'phrul dag gis gshegs par brtsom// kha cig sa brtol gyen du 'byung// kha cig nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'ab ba/ kha cig stan las sprul par byed//rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la ltos// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ sku drang por bsrang nas dgongs pa mngon du phyogs bar bzhag go/

ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhug pa na/sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu r
tu g.yos so// chom chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/ shar phyogs mthonan nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho nani shar phyogs dma'/lce phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogha
mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' 'o// rgyal pos tsho dang ldan pa gang de la dris pa/ 'phags pa gang po 'di tso zhig lags/des smyos pa/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis mngon par 'dud pa bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa des n/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa lags so// des na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsar gyi 'od gzer gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi

sta des 'dzam bu'i gling gsar zhunam lta bur snang bar gyur to// yang rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur pas mig phye nas dris pa/ 'phags pa gang po 'di ci lags/des smās pa/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsar gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od gzer bco ba lags so////'dul ba bzhi/// kham porti shu lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'angs dul ba 'khor

dul ba zhib 'bor zhib dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu slo ma lta bur gshegs so// de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha des ba ku la'i yal ga zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la grib ma byed cing rjes/
bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la ltal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyenanas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos
bshad pa mdzad de/ thos nas lha de 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo re'u mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcomanas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur to// ji

tsaman phyogs gzhan zhig na/ yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag gse/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpa byad bzang po brgyad cus

mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po tsho'ir bo 'gro bo lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo// mthong ma thag tu yang de rnams bcom ldan 'das lasoms
/ dang ba chen po gyes so// 'di ni chesanyid yin te/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyi sems can gyis// dang por sangs rgyas ma thongs ltar lo bcu gnyis su zhigs kyi sems

goms par byas pa dang/ bu mdā pas bu rnyed pa dang/ dbul bos gter mthong ba dang/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob pa ni de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa ma yin no// de nas bcom
tshe ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag cag la 'di lta bu nimasum
bgyis te/ phas ma la gas/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lhas ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'dus pas ma lags/ dge sbyong
dang bram zes ma la gas pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzod de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtshe nibaskams/ rus ba'ir ba lasan basprul n gnas ong gi me kum/ thar nang
07/ mtho ris kyi sgo ni phye nas/ bdag cag lha dang mi rnams sun po kod de/ btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi de ge 'dun la
skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ de dag stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// kya ma bcom ldan 'dus bdag cag la cung zad cig stsol cig dang/ de la bdag cag bgyi ba dag bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu sku dang sanamo bregs ton

no de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rtenazhig brtsigs so// de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsholan gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des/ mchod rten de'i 'khor sar ba ku la'i lag de bskyed

de༴ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mchod rten 'di le bgyi ba bgyid cing mchis so zhes de de nyiden gnas so// de la kha cig gis ni yugs sa mo'i mchod rten no zhes bya bar shes so/ kho
cig gis ni ba ku la'i 'khor sa zhes bya bar shes te/mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag da dung yang phyag byed do// bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dwang/ jitsaman bsti gnas gzhan zhin

drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/de dag gi bsti gnas de ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pas/de dag des rgyakānas ci yang mi sempa so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/
bste gnas der gshegs te byon pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyis bsti gnas de'i me tog dung 'bras bu ni rlu gas/ nasems zhe khugasang rnams ni glogs/'dug gnas dag 'birtage go/deshas drang srong

de dag lag pa 'tham pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ṇi'i phyiresems khongs su chudacing 'dug/ de rnam kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi zhing
rkang gnyis khyod 'dir gshegs n/ bdag cagana gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong dag bsti gnas me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pa

ci ste ma rung/ ji sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du bya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul brtul ba dang/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du

gyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drung song lnga pa rgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun

pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de drag gse phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par basgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar babatud

du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun ba bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba lerab tu 'byung ba dang/ bstan par rdzogs pa da ge slong gi dengos po thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

[z/ ]sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog tshangs bar spyad pa spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod la sku dang kha spu

byi ba dang/ snam sbyar gyon par gyur ti/ lagan lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang/ skra dang kha sa zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya len pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas
par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shogi bka' stsal pas/ skra byi snam sbyar gyoneba'i lus ldan zhing/ mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ sangs dgongs pas lus gzugs bkob bar gyur/

de dag gis 'badra pa dang brtsal bar brtson 'grus brtsams pas/'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang/ mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa thamasaṃcad ces bya ba nas/ mngon du sku bar bya bar
gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar grongam bzhin du'o// de dag la 'doms par byed ba'i drang srong gang pa des gsol pa/ bcom ldanu'adas bdag gis cha byad 'dis skye bo'i tshogs chen po bsdus pa drodag dzad dapa

skyos par bgyis la/sladakyis rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong lnga brgya dang sngon gyi dge slong rnams kyis zla ba khams lta bur bskoranas/ de nyid du rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gyin mamakha'
las gshegs te rim gyis gtunari la byon no// de'i gtunar la drang srong shing gsacan zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/rang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes khu chen po'i[R]tshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
kyis kun nas brgyan ba zhes byab nas/ kun nas mdzes rgyang ring bo kho na nas mthong ngo zhes byaba'i bar du go ma bzhin du// mthong m thag tu de bcom ldan 'das lasems mngon par da bar

gyurato/ de da ba skyes nas bsamasab/ ma la bdag ri las babs te/bcom ldan 'dasabalta zhing 'thor ni/ bcom ldan 'das gdul ba la gzigs pas 'das par 'gyur gyis/ mkha'adag nyid mchong bar bya'o snyan s/ris las bdaganyid

achos ba dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nibasnyal ba mi mnga' ba'i chos ma yin bas/ bcom ldam 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang

bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de de thos pas shing gos can gyis phyir mi bo dba'i 'bras bu man sum du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon bar bsgrubs nas/ donas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bstan par rdzogs pa phyogs slong gi dngos po thob pa ltan zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'aoṃ kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes byab dang/

pa༔ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab bar gyur/ ces bya ba'i ba gongam bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ ge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'i dge slong da pas rnam par grol ba rnams

kyi mchogazhi yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong shing gos na/ 'di nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te/ chob phrul rnam ba sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer slom lta bur gshegs so//bcom
ldan 'das kyis dgongs// gal te sgo gcig nas zhugs na/ gzhan dag gzhan dusags par 'gyur bas/ mal da rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ donas rdzu 'phrulargyas stong gi

nam mkha' las grong khyer spyo ma lta bu'i dbus su gshegs so// de nas slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal bo dad/ tshe dang ldan pagang po dang/ shing gi rna chacan dang/ rgya skyegs kyi rna chacan dad lta

phyi'i rnam can dad/ rgyal bo'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang dad rang gi 'khor dung/ srog chags brgya stong phrag dum bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'dus srog chags brgya stong

phrag du mas zham nyid byas shing tsan dan gyi 'khrid ba'i khang bzad sagang nab dal gshogs byon nas/ ga slong gi dga' dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po des bcom ldan
bdas ma mthong ngo// tsan dan gyi 'phyang pa'i khang bas zhig la thug ba da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal tatsan dan gyi 'thung ba'i khang bzangs shig par gyur na/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi
bsod nams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ ma la sa'adishel gyi rang bzhin du sprul pa bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'aakyis de ji lta skye bo'i tshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pachad par mthong bar gyur

bangashel gyi rang bzhin du sbrul lo// de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong
phrag du mas khyad par chen pog rtogs te/ kha cig gis ni thar ba'i cha dang mthunapa'i dge ba'i rtsa babaskyod/ kha gcig gis ni ngas bar 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun po// khacig gis ni rgyun duzhug
za ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gisani lanag phyir 'ong ba'i 'brasabu/ khag gis ni phyi mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni ba tu bya nas ni mongs pa thams cad sbas dgra bcom pa mngon

sumadu byas/ khacig gis ni na thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyid/ khacig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'i// kha cig gis ni thun mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o// 'khor de phalachar sangs

rgyus la gzhol ba dang/ chos l babab pa dang } dge 'dun la bab ba bkod do// de nas shing gi rna chacan dad/ rgya skyegs kyi na gdung/ khatsho'i rna ba can gyis/ gtsang zhing bsod ba'i babra' ba dang bca' ba
dag stagen byas nas gdan bshams te/ mo bu'i chu stod bzha gnas / bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsolab/ btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan pos da de'i dus la
bub par dgongs su gsol/de tsho klu'i rgyal po nag bo dang 'ga'u ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsam pa// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer slo ma lta bu n chos 'chad kyis/

dengal mnyan par bya'o snyam mo// de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang/ grong khyer slo ma lta bur chubo lnga brgya phab nas rmas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsnyal ba mimanga' pa'i sas yin pas

00 bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu'i rgyal po ga po dang ba ga'u ta ma ba di gnyes gal te grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'ongs pa na rgyu na/ yul phung pas byed bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'as kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa

mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ris pa'i bsod snyoms long zhig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu deci'i phyir zhe na/ rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na }glo bur
ba da }'gro bar chas pa dad nad pa dad/ nad g.yog dang } dge skos so// skabs 'di'i ni bcom ldan 'das dug skyos su dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de de nas steng gi nam mkha' las

gshegs s// bcom ldan 'das dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang bag bu ta ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbangapogrong khyer spom lta bu lasoms la yul phung bar ma bya

zhig dganyis kyis gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag chagagangasrog chags grog sbu la yang gnod ba midagyid bde lta bu'i dad bsamachisan 1 smom lta bu na gnas pa'i skyo bo tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis kya'i rgyal bonag po dang le'u tamal de lta bu'i chos bshad ba mdzad de/ de thosanas sangs rgyas dad/ chos dang } dga' dun la skyabs su song zhing/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo// baa
ldan 'das kyis zas gsolaba'i mdzad pa brtsams pa dang/ klu'i nas bsams pa// kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das la bdagagi chu'i bdung bgasol lasnyom mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa
ta gcig gi cha gsolanani/ des na gzhan dang gzhan dusams par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham bar bya'o snyam dudagosanas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisatshe dang ldan pa mo'u

za 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa// mo'u gal busongalagang na chu bo lta brgya 'dris pa de las rnyas lhung bzed khongal khyer shog cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu

chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi lta mnyan nas/ gang du chu bo lcabargya'aphros pa de nas chus lhung bzengabakang nas khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i
chu phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo/[0f05 ]/ tshodad ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bka' stsal pa// dge slong dgu pha dang masazhi bgasos/

bsringasabaskyadad nus mas bsnun/ 'dzam bu gling gis tshogs ston par byed pa yin pasashin tudaka' ba byed palto/ bus phrag pagacig lan ma bzhag/ gshos ni ba bzhag nas lo brgya tshong bar khul du thogs sam/

sachen bo 'di'i no bu dad/ mu tig dang/ brtudang/ man shel dang/ byicu dang/ dngul dang/ gas dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ sbug dang/ padma nā ga dang/ dung g.yas su 'khyil ba lta/ de lta bu ' dbang phyug la
bdag por bcug kyang/ bus pha mald tsam gyis phan thogs pa 'am/ lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis pham dad pa chod pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jugal/ 'dul zhing 'dzudade/

sa sor 'god par byed pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa tshulakhrims phun sum tshogs pa dang/ so sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang/ shasab 'amalapa shes ba phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
la 'dul shing 'dzud de/ so sor 'god par byed na/ de tsam gyis bus pha dang ma la phan 'dogs pa dang lan lon pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gis ni ma la lan ci yang ma len gyis/ ma la bdag
gis bdagagi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nasabasam ba la/ shugs ba dang } 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzos can du skyes par mthong ngo// sa de su'i gdul ba yin par brtags// bcom ldan 'das
kyis yin par mthong nas de 'di snyam du sams te/ bdagam ring bo 'di'i rongs pas/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'dasal na 'di gsal lesnyam nas/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol
do btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pha dang ma bu la shin tu dka' babyed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer can du skyes te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse banye bar bzung ste gdul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'galagyi bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dong bcom

ldan 'das bdag gi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi bu chen po rab kyi rtsa mal gom pa bor zhing gshegs pa dang/ zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gathor chen du byon ngo// bu mo bzang

mo des tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyang ring po lon nas mthong ngo//mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song sta skyasapa/ kyama'o yun ring zhig log nas bu mthong ngo/ kyamaṇo yun ring

༉ mozhoge len nas bu mthong ngo/ de nas skye bo'i tshog sazhapos smras pa// shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 'di ni rgazhan/ ji lta bu mo 'di ri'i mayin/ tshe dang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan ga
kho bo'i lus 'di 'as bskyod de/ san kho bo ma yin no/ 'du nasabcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i

bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de shosan bu mo bzang mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtswa mnyiddhishu mthob ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas

[E/]sa bden pa mthong nas lan gsum gyis ched du brjod ba rmad du brjod do zhes bya ba nas/ lhadang mi rnams su bab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar gongam bzhinano// yang smras// nyes pa mang por ldan pasamibagrad pa'i
zhu song lamani khyod kyi mthus bcad do// mtho ris 'grub bsod nams bathang ldan bya// mya ngan 'dasaba'i lam yang bgagis thob// khyod labarten nas shin tu rnam dag mig/ nyis dang bralabusadag
bded 'di thob// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phangani thob nas// sdugabasngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol bdag gis rgal// 'grobang lha min lha dad mis mchod ba// skyarga 'chi dang ba dang rnam bral ba// srid ba
00 stong du rtsod pa rab dka' po// thub pa khyod mthong deng 'dir 'bras bur bcas// btsus babadag ni 'phags shing mngon par 'phags to/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dad/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su mchil

kyisadag bstan du gzung du gsol/ ded slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag bsaskyabs su mchi bar mngon par sprulags s// bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen podang thabs cig tu deng bsod snyoms sbyor
zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mod la cang mi gsung bsaganang ngo// de nas bu mobathang mas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba zhig ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang/
tshe dad ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa [.. “]'brel ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed d/ rnam grod dum gtsangashing bsad/
pa'i babral ba dang bcas ba dag rang gi lag nasabastabs shing tshom par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsolazin nas/ phyag gnyis bsubs te ltung bashrad rgyu bar rig nas/ stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bting nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltung bgrad tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi bu chen pos blangs te/ lhud
bzad 'khru bar byad pa na/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu'adong ngam } bcom ldan 'das gshegs so// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi// gal ted lta
// nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi[%]la sems shag khacom ldan ba sa'oskyel khyon lags sam mo'u 'gal gyi bu yu bu phyin zan te// de las ngo mtshal dudad pa'i yid kyis gsel pa bcom
ldan s rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming su lags/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yid mgyogs yin no// btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi ches ba me de lta bu n bdag ga ge bar mchud do// gal te bdag gi gle bar chud par gyur na bag
lugatil gyi phyam ltar gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyin ma ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ nganibang chog pa bzhin 'bagyi'i angamams so//
dag slong rnams btsemasyas te/dertsom thams cud gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las zhig bgyisan/las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor mang ba/
longs spyod chab ragasasu sa lags/las zhag bgyisan sa bran mo'i ming la duskyas shang ra ba tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lagros/bcom ldan
bdas kyis bka' stsal pa dag slong dag gang pa nyid kyis lasatshogs rnyed pa rgyun yang sasubasgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shang bsags bas/
gang pas las byas shang bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gyis so sor skye bar 'gyur/ dag slong dag los byas shing bsags pa dag na phyi rol gyi sa'i khams rnam par smin par ma 'gyur ba khams pa mi

'gyur ma bams la ma 'gyur}rlung ga bams la mi 'gyur gyi 'ang de ltar las dag pa dang 'am dug pa byas shing bsags pa dganazan pa'i re zung pa dang/ khams dang sku mchad dag la rnam par sman pa 'gyur te/

las rnamubaskal pa brgyar yang nachung ma lnga ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rad nas lus can rnams 'bade/ 'bras bu drag tu 'gyur ba nyid// ngag speng ga sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nying la su dgu'i tshal nya khri thub pa
na sten pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyas bu 'dul ba kha la sbyar ba bla ma med pa/ lha

dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs bas bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dgrong khyer wā rātstsha ra nye bar brtan cing bzhugs so//nga'i bstan pa la 'di rab tuphyo nas sde snod gsum

par gyur [”]chos bzhin gyi drag 'dun gyi zhal ta pa byed do/ de zhig cig ma dgra bcom pa zhig la dag sgos babaste/ nges gatshug lag khang phyag par bya bar brtsams pa dang/ rlung langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer

bang gyur to// ngas bsaya pa re zhig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du gzhug gosnyam pa las/rjetsam na gtsug lag khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta pa des mthong nas/de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub pa'i las byung pa
bran mo'i bu zhig ngag skas khyed/ dgra bcom pa des mthong nas/des bsams pa/'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas ba zhig bzhag la phyes go bar bya'o snyam nas gang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe
pa'i drung duseng snyams/khyod kyis kha bsu yan shesasam des smras pa/shes ta byed dpakhe bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungasakyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin

na ngas smas pa/gal te de lta yin med kyi bo bosazhi'ib tu byung ba'i bya ba byas so// kho bo na'aching pa mtha' dag lasagrel ba an la/khyong nub ching pa mtha' dag gis bcings pa an pas/khyod kyis ngag rtsub pa'i
las nga gi nyes pa sna nyes pa shog shage dang// des na las de bsrabs pa dang/ yongs su zad pa dang/ gtugs par 'gyur ro// des zhes pa las nyes par bshags pas/sems can dmyal bar skye zhing

bran mo'i bur 'gyur ba las/ de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes par tshang bas ljabargyar bran me'amangal du skyes te/ nga ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma la yang bran ma'i mngal du rgyas par gyur to// gang yang
dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des n/ ga pa dang/ nor mang ba dang/ longs spyod che ba'i gos su byas so// gang ang de na bklags ngashang brten pas phung po la mkhas pa dang khams 'amakhā
pa dang skye mchad la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa la mkhas par byas pa ris nanga' bstan pa la rab takhyung sta nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so//
dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gzhag pa rnams kyi rnam par sman pan gcig tugazhag pa yin/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa na gcig chu dkar ba in/'drenam rnamā kyin 'drinam inamo/

02 dge slong dag de lta bas na las gzug tu gzhag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la btsa labar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ btsem ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' lanas/dag gleng de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod da//gleng gzhi ni rgyal bo'i khab na/de'i rgyal po

khaṭhan klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ra ba gnas so// de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi mu'u brgya yang rtag tu 'babal/chumig dang/ mtshodang/ tsha'u rnams kyang skam par ma 'gyur/ lhas dus dus su chan
gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ le tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu rgyal bo dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyasi brtul bzha/ de gnyis ral ba kya bang rim nas

ma'o ra yang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong ngo// de nas klu'i rgyal pa grog mkhar dang ba 'di snyam du sems te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'di gnyis/ bkyi bang rim nas nyi ma 'o
pe zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyan bkur byed cing 'ong na/ bdag cag 'anganying na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsan pokur ma byed pa nabazang po ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang bcom
ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'angs gang na ba der dong sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
[8ss]bya// 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'dasakyis de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ da thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabā su de zhing
chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su deng nas/bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangasas// gang ga tshe bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe/ lus dang longs spyod
lhag par 'phel bar gyur to// de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyagabyas nas gsal pa[R]com ldan 'das gang gatshabadag
cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu mchis shing/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnam mnos pa de'i tshe/lus dang les spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyise rjes
su gnang na/bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/klu'i dbang po dag kyang rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa anagyis rgyal pa la rtog shig/ de gnyis kyi bsam pa

dang dan gyis na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes smras nas/ nga nyide na gnas so//klu rgyal po grog mkhar dang kha ba'i kun tu spyod pan gal tu nub ma bcom ldan 'das bltar 'gron ni lta'i
bub byed kyis so//khen te nyin par na ni khyim bdag gam khyad gyis so// dganyis khyim bdag gi byad du byas shing nyin ra zhing bcom ldan 'das la bstan bar khyad de ོla pa gzug can sī pa rgyal ga

00 mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun tu spyod pa na/degang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das ltabar 'grob de'i tshe/'ga' zhig bdag mthong na ldang bar mi byed pa tshad grang zhes mi gnang chen gtong bar byed pa des ma gnang mazhig khag
ta kyi nang rdzaseng la com ldan 'das la su dge bsed bkur byed ltos shig/ de seng ba las jam na khyim bdag gnyis shage mthong nas/des bsams pa/'di gnyis ni lha'i yul na gnas pas nyi'aphyi'i

ldang bgam khyadasnyam nas reg rgyalapa' smras pa lha byam bdag gnyis shage mchis pa'i lha'i yul nyid na gnas pa lag so//rgyal pagazugs can snying pos sams pa/de gnyis kyis bdag mthong natsa'i phyire ljang/

par mi byed kyis khra'o snyam nas de sa pecem ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang ku'argyal pa grog ma bar dang bas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
cas gsel te/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchis na 'o zhig rgyal pa la bstastang bgyi bam/'on tachos la bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa klu'i dbang po dgas la bsta ste
shagi dam pa'i chos la na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang blam byed la/chos la 'gra bcom pa rnams kyang bla ma khyadado//tshegs subacad de bka' stsal pa/'das pa'i ng rgyas gang
an dang/ mkhan sang rgyas g.yon dang da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa mang pa'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad pa// bzhud ngang bzhugs dang byon gyur pa// thams cad dam chos yum ma 'di niyengs rgyas
chos te de yin// de bas 'direbadag phan 'dod pa// bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te// dam pa'i tshes la bkur ste bya// de gnyis kyis
ldang ba ma byas so// de nas rgyal po ma bzod pa skyes te/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang dang na 'khrug
tstshā pa dang/ ma dad pa la sems kyis ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i// dam chos shes par mi nus so// gang gse khro dang bgamed pa'i// sems na dul bar byas pa dang/ 'di la mnar
sams spangs pa des// legs par gsungs ba shes par 'gyur// rgyal pos bsams pa/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis 'ongs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam
nas/ de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo// de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba khyim bdag 'di gnyis mang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan snga nas
dong pa de'i tshe/ khyod gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces sgo nang/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyase la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang/ blon po dgagase bsgo ba/ lca'i zhal nos khyed/
cag gnyis pa'i yul nam 'dug cig ces gsung ngo// de gnyis kyis sa la/ bka' bzhin 'tshalamachi'o// bsams pa/ bdagacag gnyis kyis yun ring po zhig nas bsams pa gang yin pa de ni tshogs chung dusagrub/

bo snyam mo// de nas 'od pa'i chu chen po phyun gnas akreka mo chung ngu'i nang du zhugs so// glog me chung ngunas grog mo chen poraro// srog mo chen po nas chu bran du'o// chu bran nus chu chen par ro// chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen por te/

ni/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ de gnyis phyir shing lus dang longs spyod shan tu 'phel bar gyur te// ji daṃ ma dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang/ chu mgi dang/ mtsho dang/ mtsho'u rnamya

kyang chung pa dang/ ongs su zad pa dang/ gtugs par gyur la thug/ ltas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma 'apas le nyos par gyur te/mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to//

rgyal pos bsams pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'dinaklu'i rgyal po ri bo dang grog mkhar gnas te/ dkanyis kyi snyashus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab { chu mig dang/ mtsho dang/ mtshe'u rnams kyang chu tsho//
lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par gyur na/ da ni dka' thubakyi chu lnga brgya dang/ chu mig dang/ mtsho dang/ mtshe'u rnams kyang chung pa dang/
yongs su zad pa dang/ gtugs par gyur la thug/ ltas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pasal nyas par gyur te/ mu ge nyam nga ba dgen la slong mo pas zas red par dka' ba byung

par gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang grog mkhar sha 'am/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis khyer ba 'am/ sbrul khas sdagasakyis bzung la 'am/ des 'jigs nas bros par ma gyur kyang/ da lta mod kyi sangasaṃ
rgyas bcom ldan 'dras ni thams cad mkhyenapa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
dar song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kanyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ko/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das
la don de rgyas par gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de gnyis ni shi ba yang ma yin/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha'alcing gis kyang mkhyer/ sbrul khas sngags kyis kyang
mabazung/ de'i 'jigs pas kyang ma bros mod kyi/ rgyal po khyed nyid kyis yul nas bskrad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar madran n/ dgenyis yulenas bsad pa

lta smos kyang ca'atshal/ rgyal po chen po ngas khyod la dran par bya'o// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khyim badrag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam/ bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// de gnyis ni klu'i

rgyal po re si dang grog mkhar yanen// btsun pa dganyis gang du mchis/ rgya mtsho chen por dang// bdag gi yul ma rung par gyur lags so// rgyal po chen po de gnyis la bzod pa byan cig dang ma rung par ma/
'gyur ro// deganyes rgya mtsho chen po namachis na ji ltar bzed pa stsal/ dganyis tshes brgyad dang bcu zhe la/ khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas/ palinabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang/
[po]/ ngas rtags bstan gyis/ khyod kyis bzod pa byan cig/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdag gse rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi 'am/ rkang pa gnyis la gtug par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang lag pa rkyang la
klu'i dbang po bzod par gsol lo zhes smos shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos de gnyis 'ong ba la 'bad de sdod cing 'dug pa dang/ ji tsam na de gnyisekhyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas bcos
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang/ de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang/ rgyal pos lag pa mngon du btang nas sas pa/ klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol
lo// rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o/ kal te bzod par gyur na 'dir spyon cig/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tsho bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis skyabs su'agro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas/ de

nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus dang longs spyod skyas te/ gal ter che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na yul maka ra yang ma shor bar 'gyur ro// 'o na yul mag sa rung bar 'gyur mod/ marung bar mi 'gyur ro//ji ltar

mi 'gyur/ khyod kyis khore cag gi khang bzangs gnyis brtsegs la/ zla ba drag cing dus mchod kyis shig dang/ kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhag la/ dus mchod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o// rgyal pos de bzhin du byas
pa dang/ de gnyis kyis yor dag kyang bzhag la/ dus mchod kyang rang nyid nyams su myong bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pan/ klu gdugapa dag kisi klugs
0// rud nas/ de dag kase sar ba dbab par brtsams so// rgyal po'i khab na bram ze sar ba'i sngags la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yodad/ des da bab cange phab pa dag khacad pa dang/ de laskul

ma gattan gnas pa'i spyi bo'i tshigs kyis dbang thang byin no// lho phyogasan brasaza mas spyan zhes bya ba sar ma'asngags la mkhas pa zhag e dpa des/ byang phyogs na yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhuka yod da/

de na rgyal po smra mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid khyed du 'jug go/ de'i yulan klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi ka nas yod de/ de nasman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas/ da'i ched du 'gro'o zhes de chas te ras
gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze sarab 'i sngags 'chang bda'i gnas su zhugs pa dang/ jitsam na ser ba chen po bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des bcad par ma nus nas/de phyir byunganang du
zhugs par byed pa dang/ bram zems spyan gyis dris pa/ mkhan po ci'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung nang du zhugs par mdzad/ des smras pa/ bu sar ba chen po bab bkacad par ma nus pas mod/ bdag

gis dgum mo// khu legs so// des chu nyung zhage la bzlas te gtor bas tshal pa brgyar rgyas so// rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams achog tungo mtshar du gyur nas/ rnganazogasatabram ze de'i

khyim ru dong nas smras pa/ mkhan po rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyur gyis/ rngan pa la nag ci'i phyir/khyod kyase seng chen po khums pa'i slad du'o// des sbas pa/kho bosazhim bcaded//

'on kyang bram ze 'ase bcad do// de dag khram ze pa'i rung du dong nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug tsag dang dbang thang sbyin no// de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes du gnas so// des sarab de dus spa gitsam zhig gi
bar du sngags kyis bags te mi 'bab pagyurato// rgyal po'i khakyi bram ze dang khyim bdaga rnams kyis sas pa/ shes ldan dag cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis sar pa mi 'bab na/ci'i phyir de la dbang thang
sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do// bram ze dus sngags btul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang/ phyir yang sarab 'bab par gyur to// de rnams bram ze de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po bram

bo'i skya 'u de gar mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag gis de la bkur ste ma byas pas de song ngo// mkhan po gal te mchis na bdag cag la sgronacige/ de bzhin du bya'o// de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog

gang na ba der song stakhyenanas/ rgyal po bde mchog la rgyal kha dang chostsal ba dag byas nas sas pa/ lha khyod kyi yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba ma chis pa po'i gnas na/ mod la mthu skyod pa zhes bya

ba'i sman mchis kyis/ lha re ston tsage dang lha'i skal ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ kya bram ze klu'i rgyal porab mdzes ni gtum po yin pas des khyod smug pas byas grang/ lha rizhig bdag la

sngags kyi cho gru dang/ nagyi mthu mchis te/gal te klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/gur shing gi tshal lam/ 'om bu'i chol zhig gang bar gyur kyang/ bdag gi kha spu
0// gcig kyang bskyod par drom thog na/ku'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang lha'i mi dgum pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam/ bram khre yod do// lha de ba zhig

dang des de'i gnas ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos ma de la bos te bsgo ba/ kyi nang rje bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig/ lhabaka' gzhi 'tshal sam des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas

bram ze de 'de de chas so// ji tsaman marong pa zhig tu bsdad nas de la smras pa/ bram ze tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag sbrengs pa pha ga mthong ngam/ mthong ngo/ de klu'i rgyal po 'ba medzes kyi gnas yin no// de song ste des

der mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du drags nas des de thogs te yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal ba byas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyishi nas/ bram ze de nyid kyi khyim du

zhugs so// de ltas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbyin pa dang/ de dgamachod yon thogs te lcags nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig dbang thang sbyin no//des smras pa/
khyed cag gis bkur stan byas pas le po mi 'dug go/ de rnams kyis de gzhag par gal gyis 'du bar brtsams te gsol ba btab pa dang/ khas blangs nas de dag gis 'tsho ba'i rig bcad do// 'jig rten nephun

sumatshog pa 'dod kyi/ rgud pa dang mi mthun pas/des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma byas te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dagur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/dag 'dagur spyod pa 'byed

bkatshu'u zhig btsas te/des de'i ming ri'i can zhes bya bar btags so//de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/dga' dgar spyod pa byed pa bu mo zhig btsas te// de'among nasir gzhes bya bar btags so//bram ze mon 'i khor bral

zhes bya'o//mna' man glog ces bya'o//des bsams pa/ yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing las byed/yun ringge ma tu sngags kyis bgag pa bya'o zhes/ des yun ring por sngags kyis dgag pa byas te bzhag pas ser bam

khab bar gyur to// rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis sbas pa bdag cag na'ibasodanams kyi mthus ser ma 'bab// ci'i phyi'i dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do// bram ze dephrag
ga gi zol gyisan pas/ bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin du ma bcug go/ bde ba la chags pas kha tonamang ma byas la/sman yang skam du ma bcug go/ des sngags kyi tshig rnams ni bsam na brjod/
smanan mo bskams pas rul bar gyur to// de rgyal po'i khab kyi thamaṃ ze dang khyim bdag rnams n snyang n chos nas/ de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyire mu stags kyi gnas dang/ bka' thub kyi
tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag gang gse gang bsams pa dang/ gang don du gnyer bde la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/ den kha cig gis smras pa/
ma zhugs shig//kha cig gas smras pa/ dug zazhag/ kha cigags smras pa/ g.yang sanas bdag nyide mchongs shig/ kha cig gis smras pa/bdag rang gi skya la thag pas thogs te/ shange ga yal ga las//
'a/ 'phyang du chug cig ces thams cad kyis 'chi ba'i phebs bstan gyi nges par 'byung ba thebs na ma yin pas de ma kyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo// des dge slong zhig mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa
ba gang gis gang bsams pa dang/ gang na du gnyer bde la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga'amachis sam/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung zhig/ der mi zhig bgyi/

dar ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par sbyod pa yang spyan par bya/ bsams gtan dang gdon pa dang ldan par mngagasas par bya ste/ gal te re zhig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob na/des na de nyid byed kyi sdug

bsngal gyi mthar phyin paminano//'on te sbyor ba'i lhagam dang bcas bzhin dus byed// gang bsams pa dang gangadasho du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//'phags pa de ni rdzomathogon gzhan yang cung
zad tsamangs/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gdage 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol cig/ de yang ma thogs na gzhan bstan du gsol/bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi lngashadros

la gdugs tshod gsol te smon lam thob cig dang/ gangabasams pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub po// 'phags pa den rdzobreg gis bgyi'ozhis/des bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi sngon nga
ti gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnasazhasabasad la bdag der skye zhing/ de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi so nems la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces btab po//

[d]/ de la chung mas dris pa/ rje'i sras smo lam pa zhig btab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes lnga'i gnas nas bsar la bdag der skye zhing/ de nas rgyal po'i khab kyiyaṃ rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces
smon lam btab po// legs te bdag kyang khyod kyi chumar gyur cig/ bus smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bur gyur cig/ de bzhin du bu mos smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bumor gyur cig/ de bzhin du mna'ams

smras pa/ bdag kyang mna' mar gyur cig ces byas nas/ de rnams khyim rnying pa zhig tu zhugs te nyal ba dang/ sprin kha dog lnga pa las char babs te/ rtsig pa 'gyel bsazhon te kha tag ge/ klu rab mdzes

ga'i phos nas/ 'khor ka drug khri dang der skyes nas/ de yang rab madzes zhes bya bar grags so// chung ma 'khel bralazhes bya'o// bunar ba can zhes bya'o// bu mo ni ser bzhus bya'o// mna' man glog ces
bya'o// chos nyid kyis klu 'am/ klu'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma len par gsum dran par 'gyur te/ gang nas sha 'phos pa dang/ gang du skyes pa dang/ las gang gas yane pa'o// des bltas na ma las sha
'phos so// gang du skyes she na/ku rnams su'o// las gang gas she na/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// ci'i phyir snyam na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi mo rnams la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir ro// des bsams pa/ rtsol
tog ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa lo byan ma rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ram/'on tem skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/ des ji ltar skyes pa la byas pa ltar skyes pa la ni de lta ma
[pa ]// yan par mthong nas/ des 'khor rnams la bskob/ shes ldan dag tshur shog/ yul ma ga dhar deng char pas lo tog thams cad skrunacige/ de rnams kyis lo tog thams cad bsku/

pa dang/ dezhas drug stong ga la'o dang/ gshol mda' tsamagu chatshargyun gyis ji ltal yul ma ga dhar sog ma yang khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams so// de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/
sog ma ang klu 'dis phyogs so zhes di'i ming sog ma medaces bya bas thogs so// pa sdo ma la/ rgyal po'i khab dang na lanod// 'od ma'i dbyug pa dmar bu'i grong/ chu bo ganggā sngon brtsegs
dang/ sga chen yangs pa tha ma yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od a'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pan bzhugs so// gang gi tshi gzhon nu ma skyes dgi lha spyan gyis

sbad nas/ pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bsad de rang nyid kyis cod pan bcingasazhus rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tsho/ dos bcom ldan 'das la kur sta ma yid pa mang po khyab brtsams// bkrongs pa man chad
bya ba'i phyi'i glang po che nor skyong dang/ khyi gtum po za ba dag spyad pa dang/ de'i ma lus 'phags mas smras pa/ bu bcom ldan 'das la bkur stam yin pa ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams n bkur sti ma yin pas bstengs pa ī'i rgyas/ rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi mthus yul ang gdang/ mang gadzha rnams 'byor cing nyams dga'
pa yan no// snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/ cigang na bcom ldan 'das med pa'i yul de dag gzhag pa dang/ stongs par gyur tam/ de mas thams cad kyi thams cad du zlog kyang ma btub nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa 1 gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'ad bsodonams ma yin pa mang du bsags kyis/ ngas 'dug zhi med pa'i dad pa la bzhag tu de 'de dus la ma bab pas mnyan yod du
gshegs so snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rami rgyus rgyu zhade gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/
mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zos sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mtha' rgyal phran dag gos bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur snyem 5ne ra byas pas//
de bkur sti ma yasgo pas bsangs nas/ rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon no zhes thos nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ re zhig rgyal po sdig can des pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan
ra bsad nas/ des kyang mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das smad ng ༔ lha ma yāni dang/ ma rnams kyis mchod ba de la yang bkur sti ma yin pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur
stim ya pas bsangs pa yin pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon par gyur pas/ de yong ya rgyal sride las du byungebar bya'o
bya/ snyams/ de dag gis phan tshun bortas bzugs nas blo gros gcig tu byas te dpu tshigs mnalag bzhapa ge bskon pa grung bo'i tshogs dang/ rtapa'i
ze tshogs dang/ shing pa'i rigs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang/ rgyal po 'i khab tu dong ste le bcom nas phrar bskor te 'khod de/ klu'i rgyal bo seg med kyis kyang so ba'i rgyun phab bas
khe tog lhag ma rnams ma rung bar byas so// dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgyadang/ chumag dang/ mtsho dang/ mtsho'u rnams skams la thug pas mu ge byung bar gyur to// chu lhags ma gzhan dag kyang matha'i
zlargyal phran dag gas dug gis ma rung ba byas so// de nas m sadagra sdug bsngal ma pozad ng/ rtsab pa/ nyam nga bar gyur pa la/ mi ma yin pa dag ga gis 'gas redadarnal thal bas btab pa ltar
mi sa byung ste/ khyogs dang khyogs 'dud par gyur to// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnod pa brgya du mas snying krugs pas/ lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug
ṇṇaṃ ga de nas lus 'phags mas sas pa/ buci'i phyir sems khongs su chud/ ma la gnod pa brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur te// bu khe mes sngar khyed la bcom ldan 'das
la bkur ste ma yin pa ma byed cig/
